13480435Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, string>
13480435Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, string> allTheThings = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void ReadIt()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Open the file into a streamreaderDi2015NewLine    using (System.IO.StreamReader sr = new System.IO.StreamReader("text_path_here.txt"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!sr.EndOfStream) // Keep reading until we get to the endDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string splitMe = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            string[] bananaSplits = splitMe.Split(new char[] { ':' }); //Split at the colonsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bananaSplits.Length < 2) // If we get less than 2 results, discard themDi2015NewLine                continue; Di2015NewLine            else if (bananaSplits.Length == 2) // Easy part. If there are 2 results, add them to the dictionaryDi2015NewLine                allTheThings.Add(bananaSplits[0].Trim(), bananaSplits[1].Trim());Di2015NewLine            else if (bananaSplits.Length > 2)Di2015NewLine                SplitItGood(splitMe, allTheThings); // Hard part. If there are more than 2 results, use the method below.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SplitItGood(string stringInput, Dictionary<string, string> dictInput)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    List<string> fish = new List<string>(); // This list will hold the keys and values as we find themDi2015NewLine    bool hasFirstValue = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in stringInput) // Iterate through each character in the inputDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (c != ':') // Keep building the string until we reach a colonDi2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        else if (c == ':' && !hasFirstValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fish.Add(sb.ToString().Trim());Di2015NewLine            sb.Clear();Di2015NewLine            hasFirstValue = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (c == ':' && hasFirstValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Below, the StringBuilder currently has something like this:Di2015NewLine            // "    235235         Some Text Here"Di2015NewLine            // We trim the leading whitespace, then split at the first sign of a double spaceDi2015NewLine            string[] bananaSplit = sb.ToString()Di2015NewLine                                     .Trim()Di2015NewLine                                     .Split(new string[] { "  " },Di2015NewLine                                            StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add both results to the listDi2015NewLine            fish.Add(bananaSplit[0].Trim());Di2015NewLine            fish.Add(bananaSplit[1].Trim());Di2015NewLine            sb.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }                    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fish.Add(sb.ToString().Trim()); // Add the last result to the listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < fish.Count; i += 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This for loop assumes that the amount of keys and values added togetherDi2015NewLine        // is an even number. If it comes out odd, then one of the lines on the inputDi2015NewLine        // text file wasn't parsed correctly or wasn't generated correctly.Di2015NewLine        dictInput.Add(fish[i], fish[i + 1]); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13481208Di2015UniqueSeparatorINotifyPropertyChanged
13481208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PropertyChangedBase : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnPropertyChanged<T>(Expression<Func<T>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        var propertyName = GetPropertyName(propertyExpression);Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null) handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetPropertyName<T>(Expression<Func<T>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = propertyExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            if (unaryExpression == null) Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a MemberExpression.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memberExpression = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a MemberExpression.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = memberExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        if (propertyInfo == null) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Expression must be a Property.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13481911Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetDecimalPlaces(decimal decimalNumber) {Di2015NewLine    int decimalPlaces = 1;Di2015NewLine    decimal powers = 10.0m;Di2015NewLine    if (decimalNumber > 0.0m) {Di2015NewLine        while ((decimalNumber * powers) % 1 != 0.0m) {Di2015NewLine            powers *= 10.0m;Di2015NewLine            ++decimalPlaces;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return decimalPlaces;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13482788Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[StoredProcName] Di2015NewLine    @page_size INTDi2015NewLine    , @page_num INTDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET NOCOUNT ON;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ; WITH RESULTS ASDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        SELECT *Di2015NewLine            , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY <order_col> DESC) AS rnDi2015NewLine            , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY <order_col> ASC) AS rn_reversedDi2015NewLine        FROM <table>Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    SELECT *Di2015NewLine        , CAST(rn + rn_reversed - 1 AS INT) AS total_rowsDi2015NewLine        , CAST(CASE (rn + rn_reversed - 1) % @page_sizeDi2015NewLine            WHEN 0 THEN (rn + rn_reversed - 1) / @page_sizeDi2015NewLine            ELSE ((rn + rn_reversed - 1) / @page_size) + 1 Di2015NewLine            END AS INT) AS total_pagesDi2015NewLine    FROM RESULTS aDi2015NewLine    WHERE a.rn BETWEEN 1 + ((@page_num - 1) * @page_size) AND @page_num * @page_sizeDi2015NewLine    ORDER BY rn ASC Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

waiting.");Di2015NewLine                _waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Waking up...");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var item = NextQueuedItem;Di2015NewLine            if (item != null)   // Item can be missing if woken up when the worker is being cleaned up and closed.Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format("Worker processing item: {0}", item.Data));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_worker != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _workerTerminateSignal = true;Di2015NewLine            _waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine            if ( !_worker.Join( TimeSpan.FromMinutes( 1 ) ) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Worker busy, aborting the thread.");Di2015NewLine                _worker.Abort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _worker = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SomeObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string 13487249Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable GetDataSourceFromFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dt = new DataTable("CreditCards");Di2015NewLine    string[] columns = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lines = File.ReadAllLines(fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // assuming the first row contains the columns informationDi2015NewLine    if (lines.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        columns = lines[0].Split(new char[] { ',' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var column in columns)Di2015NewLine            dt.Columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // reading rest of the dataDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < lines.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataRow dr = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        string[] values = lines[i].Split(new char[] { ',' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < values.Count() && j < columns.Count(); j++)Di2015NewLine            dr[j] = values[j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dt.Rows.Add(dr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13487252Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<string,int> GenerateTerms(string[] docs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Dictionary<string, int>> combinedDictionaryList = new List<Dictionary<string, int>>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string str in docs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Add returned dictionaries to a listDi2015NewLine        combinedDictionaryList.Add(ProcessDocument(str));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //return a single dictionary from list od dictionariesDi2015NewLine    return combinedDictionaryListDi2015NewLine            .SelectMany(dict=> dict)Di2015NewLine            .ToLookup(pair => pair.Key, pair => pair.Value)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(group => group.Key, group => group.Sum(value => value));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Dictionary<string,int> ProcessDocument(string doc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return doc.Split(' ')Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(word => word)Di2015NewLine            .OrderByDescending(g => g.Count())Di2015NewLine            .Take(1000)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(r => r.Key, r => r.Count());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13488152Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MergeMixinsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<int> MergeSort(this IObservable<int> This, IObservable<int> other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Create<int>((observer) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Queue<int> BufferA = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLine                Queue<int> BufferB = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Action<Queue<int>, int> update = (Queue<int> pushBuffer, int value)=>{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    pushBuffer.Enqueue(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    while (BufferA.Count() != 0 && BufferB.Count() != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (BufferA.Peek() < BufferB.Peek())Di2015NewLine                            observer.OnNext(BufferA.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                            observer.OnNext(BufferB.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return new CompositeDisposable(Di2015NewLine                    This.Subscribe(v => update(BufferA, v)),Di2015NewLine                    other.Subscribe(v => update(BufferB, v)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13488629Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring sampleText = null;Di2015NewLinestring Key = null;Di2015NewLinelong KeyLength = 0;Di2015NewLinelong Position = 0;Di2015NewLineint character = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (Position = 1; Position <= sampleText.Length; Position++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    character = Convert.ToInt32(Key[(Position % KeyLength) - KeyLength * ((Position % KeyLength) == 0) - 1]);Di2015NewLine    SimulateMidStatement.MidStatement(sampleText, Position, (char)(Convert.ToInt32(sampleText[Position - 1]) ^ character), 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine//  Copyright  2003 - 2012 Tangible Software Solutions Inc.Di2015NewLine//  This class can be used by anyone provided that the copyright notice remains intact.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine//  This class simulates the behavior of the classic VB 'Mid' statement.Di2015NewLine//  (Note that this is unrelated to the VB 'Mid' function).Di2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLinepublic static class SimulateMidStatementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void MidStatement(ref string target, int oneBasedStart, char insert)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (target == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        target = target.Remove(oneBasedStart - 1, 1).Insert(oneBasedStart - 1, insert.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void MidStatement(ref string target, int oneBasedStart, string insert)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (target == null || insert == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        target = target.PadRight(target.Length + insert.Length).Remove(oneBasedStart - 1, insert.Length).Insert(oneBasedStart - 1, insert).Substring(0, target.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void MidStatement(ref string target, int oneBasedStart, string insert, int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (target == null || insert == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int minLength = System.Math.Min(insert.Length, length);Di2015NewLine        target = target.PadRight(target.Length + insert.Length).Remove(oneBasedStart - 1, minLength).Insert(oneBasedStart - 1, insert.Substring(0, minLength)).Substring(0, target.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13489199Di2015UniqueSeparatorShort Notation  UTF-16 character    DescriptionDi2015NewLine\\'  \\u0027  allow to enter a ' in a character literal, e.g. '\\''Di2015NewLine\\"  \\u0022  allow to enter a " in a string literal, e.g. "this is the double quote (\\") character"Di2015NewLine\\\\  \\u005c  allow to enter a \\ character in a character or string literal, e.g. '\\\\' or "this is the backslash (\\\\) character"Di2015NewLine\\0  \\u0000  allow to enter the character with code 0Di2015NewLine\\a  \\u0007  alarm (usually the HW beep)Di2015NewLine\\b  \\u0008  back-spaceDi2015NewLine\\f  \\u000c  form-feed (next page)Di2015NewLine\\n  \\u000a  line-feed (next line)Di2015NewLine\\r  \\u000d  carriage-return (move to the beginning of the line)Di2015NewLine\\t  \\u0009  (horizontal-) tabDi2015NewLine\\v  \\u000b  vertical-tabDi2015NewLine

13489385Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic BigInteger FromBinaryString(string binary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (binary == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine    if (!binary.All(c => c == '0' || c == '1'))Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BigInteger result = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var c in binary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result <<= 1;Di2015NewLine        result += (c - '0');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13490767Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Order o1 = new Order { Resenh = "abc" },Di2015NewLine              o2 = new Order { Resenh = "abc" };Di2015NewLine        ShowDiffs(o1, o2); // {nothing}Di2015NewLine        o2.Resenh = "def";Di2015NewLine        ShowDiffs(o1, o2); // Resenh changed from abc to defDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void ShowDiffs<T>(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var accessor = TypeAccessor.Create(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        if (!accessor.GetMembersSupported) throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        var members = accessor.GetMembers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var member in members)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object xVal = accessor[x, member.Name],Di2015NewLine                   yVal = accessor[y, member.Name];Di2015NewLine            if (!Equals(xVal, yVal))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} changed from {1} to {2}",Di2015NewLine                    member.Name, xVal, yVal);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13491452Di2015UniqueSeparatorPure
13491452Di2015UniqueSeparator5.4 PurityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAll methods called within a contract must be pure: that is, they must not updateDi2015NewLineany pre-existing state. (A pure method is allowed to modify objects that have beenDi2015NewLinecreated after entry into the pure method.) Code Contract tools currently assumeDi2015NewLinethe following things are pure:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine* Methods marked [Pure] (If a type is marked [Pure], then that applies to all ofDi2015NewLine  its methods.) The pure attribute is dened in the contract library. (Section 4.3)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine* Property getters.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine* Operators (static methods whose names start with op , have one or two parametersDi2015NewLine  and a non-void return type).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine* Any method whose fully qualified name begins withDi2015NewLine  System.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract, System.String, System.IO.Path, orDi2015NewLine  System.Type.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine* Any invoked delegate, provided that the delegate type itself is attributed withDi2015NewLine  [Pure]. The existing delegate types System.Predicate<T> and System.Comparison<T>Di2015NewLine  are considered pure.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIn the future, there will be a purity checker that will enforce these assumptions.Di2015NewLine

13491850Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class RC4Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static string Encrypt(string key, string data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      Encoding unicode = Encoding.Unicode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return Convert.ToBase64String(Encrypt(unicode.GetBytes(key), unicode.GetBytes(data)));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static string Decrypt(string key, string data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      Encoding unicode = Encoding.Unicode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return unicode.GetString(Encrypt(unicode.GetBytes(key), Convert.FromBase64String(data)));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static byte[] Encrypt(byte[] key, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return EncryptOutput(key, data).ToArray();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static byte[] Decrypt(byte[] key, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return EncryptOutput(key, data).ToArray();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static byte[] EncryptInitalize(byte[] key)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      byte[] s = Enumerable.Range(0, 256)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => (byte)i)Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < 256; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         j = (j + key[i % key.Length] + s[i]) & 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Swap(s, i, j);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return s;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static IEnumerable<byte> EncryptOutput(byte[] key, IEnumerable<byte> data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      byte[] s = EncryptInitalize(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      int i = 0;Di2015NewLine      int j = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return data.Select((b) =>Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         i = (i + 1) & 255;Di2015NewLine         j = (j + s[i]) & 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Swap(s, i, j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return (byte)(b ^ s[(s[i] + s[j]) & 255]);Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static void Swap(byte[] s, int i, int j)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      byte c = s[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      s[i] = s[j];Di2015NewLine      s[j] = c;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13497429Di2015UniqueSeparator    static string ToXml(object input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlSerializer serializer = CreateSerializer(input.GetType());Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var settings = new XmlWriterSettings() { OmitXmlDeclaration = true, Encoding =  Encoding.UTF8, Indent = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, settings))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(xw, input);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        output = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static T FromXml<T>(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlSerializer serializer = CreateSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output = (T)serializer.Deserialize(new StringReader(input));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static XmlSerializer CreateSerializer(Type incomingType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlAttributeOverrides attrOverrides = new XmlAttributeOverrides();Di2015NewLine        XmlAttributes newAttributes = new XmlAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        newAttributes.XmlRoot = new XmlRootAttribute();Di2015NewLine        newAttributes.XmlRoot.Namespace = ((XmlTypeAttribute)incomingType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(XmlTypeAttribute), true)[0]).Namespace;Di2015NewLine        attrOverrides.Add(incomingType, newAttributes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(incomingType, attrOverrides);Di2015NewLine        return serializer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13498000Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<List<T>> ToBatches<T>(this List<T> list, int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<T> batch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T item in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        batch.Add(item);    Di2015NewLine        index++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index == batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index = 0;                Di2015NewLine            yield return batch;Di2015NewLine            batch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return batch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13498346Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TextBoxExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool GetSelectAllOnFocus(DependencyObject obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (bool)obj.GetValue(SelectAllOnFocusProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void SetSelectAllOnFocus(DependencyObject obj, bool value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        obj.SetValue(SelectAllOnFocusProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty SelectAllOnFocusProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("SelectAllOnFocus", typeof(bool), typeof(TextBoxSelectAllOnFocusBehaviorExtension), new PropertyMetadata(false, OnSelectAllOnFocusChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnSelectAllOnFocusChanged(DependencyObject sender, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var behaviors = Interaction.GetBehaviors(sender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove the existing behavior instancesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var old in behaviors.OfType<TextBoxSelectAllOnFocusBehavior>().ToArray())Di2015NewLine            behaviors.Remove(old);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((bool)args.NewValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Creates a new behavior and attaches to the targetDi2015NewLine            var behavior = new TextBoxSelectAllOnFocusBehavior();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Apply the behaviorDi2015NewLine            behaviors.Add(behavior);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13499125Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int,string[]> word_dict = new Dictionary<int,string[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(path + "words" + (i+3) + ".txt"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                String strTemp = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                string[] words = strTemp.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                word_dict.Add(i + 3,words);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorForm1_Paint
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorDrawLorenzChaos(Graphics graphicsObj , double a, double b, double r)
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Form1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if(startDrawing)Di2015NewLine           DrawLorenzChaos(e.Graphics, aVal, bVal, rVal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Drawing.Graphics graphicsObj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinegraphicsObj = this.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLine
13499148Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap offScrBuff;Di2015NewLine    Mutex mut;Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        offScrBuff = new Bitmap(1000, 1000);Di2015NewLine        mut = new Mutex();Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Paint += new PaintEventHandler(pictureBox1_Paint);Di2015NewLine        button1.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.button1_Click);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void pictureBox1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mut.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawImage(offScrBuff, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        mut.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void DrawLorenzChaos(double a, double b, double r)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //double a = 10, b = (8.0 / 3.0), r = 28;     //standard values for lorenz modelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*m defines the number of iterations of the for loop so the number of lines drawnDi2015NewLine        good idea to keep m inversely proportional to dt (the time interval). A smaller dt willDi2015NewLine        mean smaller lines so smoother overall drawing m=50000 and dt=0.0005 is a good starting pointDi2015NewLine        that demonstrates chaos well*/Di2015NewLine        double m = 500000, dt = 0.00005;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //EVOLUTION VALUE FOR RUNGE_KUTTA METHODDi2015NewLine        //values for first particleDi2015NewLine        double y11, y12, y13;Di2015NewLine        double y21, y22, y23;Di2015NewLine        double y31, y32, y33;Di2015NewLine        double y41, y42, y43;Di2015NewLine        double y51, y52, y53;Di2015NewLine        double xi, yi, xf, yf;           //coordinates for drawing particle 1 trajectoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double f10, f11, f12, f13;      //function values to be calculated, Di2015NewLine        double f20, f21, f22, f23;      //for fxy (x>1) these are intermediate fn calculations at differentDi2015NewLine        double f30, f31, f32, f33;      //times in Runga KuttaDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //values for second particleDi2015NewLine        double z11, z12, z13;Di2015NewLine        double z21, z22, z23;Di2015NewLine        double z31, z32, z33;Di2015NewLine        double z41, z42, z43;Di2015NewLine        double z51, z52, z53;Di2015NewLine        double ai, bi, af, bf;          //coordinates for drawing particle 2 trajectory (these are badly named...)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double g10, g11, g12, g13;      //equivilant of f values for particle 2 Di2015NewLine        double g20, g21, g22, g23;Di2015NewLine        double g30, g31, g32, g33;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //OTHER NEEDED QUANTITIESDi2015NewLine        int i;          //for loop iteration intergerDi2015NewLine        int k1 = 20;    //scaling factors to make drawing fill formDi2015NewLine        int k2 = 9;Di2015NewLine        int y0 = 280;   //offset values to centre drawing on formDi2015NewLine        int x0 = 400;Di2015NewLine        int start = 10;   //starting position for calculationsDi2015NewLine        double diff = 0.01;//initial displacement between two particlesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //starting positions for particles            Di2015NewLine        y11 = start;//particle 1Di2015NewLine        y12 = start;Di2015NewLine        y13 = start;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        z11 = start + diff;//particle 2Di2015NewLine        z12 = start + diff;Di2015NewLine        z13 = start + diff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //initial coords for particles at t=0Di2015NewLine        xi = (y11) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine        yi = (y12) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLine        ai = (z11) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine        bi = (z12) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLine        for (i = 1; i <= m; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            f10 = a * (y12 - y11);Di2015NewLine            f20 = r * y11 - y12 - y11 * y13;Di2015NewLine            f30 = y11 * y12 - b * y13;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y21 = y11 + f10 * dt / 2;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the firstDi2015NewLine            y22 = y12 + f20 * dt / 2;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            y23 = y13 + f30 * dt / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            f11 = a * (y22 - y21);Di2015NewLine            f21 = r * y21 - y22 - y21 * y23;Di2015NewLine            f31 = y21 * y22 - b * y23;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y31 = y11 + f11 * dt / 2;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the secondDi2015NewLine            y32 = y12 + f21 * dt / 2;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            y33 = y13 + f31 * dt / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            f12 = a * (y32 - y31);Di2015NewLine            f22 = r * y31 - y32 - y31 * y33;Di2015NewLine            f32 = y31 * y32 - b * y33;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y41 = y11 + f12 * dt;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the thirdDi2015NewLine            y42 = y12 + f22 * dt;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            y43 = y13 + f32 * dt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            f13 = a * (y42 - y41);Di2015NewLine            f23 = r * y41 - y42 - y41 * y43;Di2015NewLine            f33 = y41 * y42 - b * y43;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y51 = y11 + (f10 + 2 * f11 + 2 * f12 + f13) * dt / 6; //final y values at y(t+dt)Di2015NewLine            y52 = y12 + (f20 + 2 * f21 + 2 * f22 + f23) * dt / 6; //then to be repesated in for loop for all stepsDi2015NewLine            y53 = y13 + (f30 + 2 * f31 + 2 * f32 + f33) * dt / 6;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xf = (y51) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine            yf = (y52) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //second particle calculationDi2015NewLine            g10 = a * (z12 - z11);Di2015NewLine            g20 = r * z11 - z12 - z11 * z13;Di2015NewLine            g30 = z11 * z12 - b * z13;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            z21 = z11 + g10 * dt / 2;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the firstDi2015NewLine            z22 = z12 + g20 * dt / 2;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            z23 = z13 + g30 * dt / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            g11 = a * (z22 - z21);Di2015NewLine            g21 = r * z21 - z22 - z21 * z23;Di2015NewLine            g31 = z21 * z22 - b * z23;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            z31 = z11 + g11 * dt / 2;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the secondDi2015NewLine            z32 = z12 + g21 * dt / 2;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            z33 = z13 + g31 * dt / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            g12 = a * (z32 - z31);Di2015NewLine            g22 = r * z31 - z32 - z31 * z33;Di2015NewLine            g32 = z31 * z32 - b * z33;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            z41 = z11 + g12 * dt;               //finding y1 y2 y3 at the thirdDi2015NewLine            z42 = z12 + g22 * dt;               //fraction of dtDi2015NewLine            z43 = z13 + g32 * dt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            g13 = a * (z42 - z41);Di2015NewLine            g23 = r * z41 - z42 - z41 * z43;Di2015NewLine            g33 = z41 * z42 - b * z43;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            z51 = z11 + (g10 + 2 * g11 + 2 * g12 + g13) * dt / 6; //final y values at y(t+dt)Di2015NewLine            z52 = z12 + (g20 + 2 * g21 + 2 * g22 + g23) * dt / 6; //then to be repesated in for loop for all stepsDi2015NewLine            z53 = z13 + (g30 + 2 * g31 + 2 * g32 + g33) * dt / 6;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            af = (z51) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine            bf = (z52) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //DRAWING LINE JUST CALCULATEDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mut.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            System.Drawing.Graphics graphicsObj = Graphics.FromImage(offScrBuff);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            graphicsObj.DrawLine(Pens.Red, (int)xi, (int)yi, (int)xf, (int)yf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            graphicsObj.DrawLine(Pens.RoyalBlue, (int)ai, (int)bi, (int)af, (int)bf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            graphicsObj.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            mut.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pictureBox1.Invalidate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //REDEFINING COORDS AND VALUES FOR NEXT LOOPDi2015NewLine            //first particleDi2015NewLine            xi = (y51) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine            yi = (y52) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLine            y11 = y51;Di2015NewLine            y12 = y52;Di2015NewLine            y13 = y53;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //second particleDi2015NewLine            ai = (z51) * k1 + x0;Di2015NewLine            bi = (z52) * k2 + y0;Di2015NewLine            z11 = z51;Di2015NewLine            z12 = z52;Di2015NewLine            z13 = z53;Di2015NewLine            /*even at 1 the below makes the program far too slow, need an alternativeDi2015NewLine             intention was for it to allow user to see the particle trajectories better*/Di2015NewLine            //System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() => { 13500711Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Queue<T> queue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyQueue(int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Capacity = capacity;Di2015NewLine        queue = new Queue<T>(capacity);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Capacity { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Count { get { return queue.Count; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Enqueue(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        if (queue.Count > Capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if you want this to do something else, such as return the `peek` valueDi2015NewLine            //modify as desired.Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Peek()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return queue.Peek();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13500746Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> Repeat<T>(this IEnumerable<T> lstEnum, int count) {Di2015NewLine    if (count < 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lst = lstEnum.ToList(); // Enumerate only onceDi2015NewLine    var ret = Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        ret = ret.Concat(lst);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13502615Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Split<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int parts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<T>(source);Di2015NewLine        int defaultSize = (int)((double)list.Count / (double)parts);Di2015NewLine        int offset = list.Count % parts;Di2015NewLine        int position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parts; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int size = defaultSize;Di2015NewLine            if (i < offset)Di2015NewLine                size++; // Just add one to the size (it's enough).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return list.GetRange(position, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the new position after creating a part list, so that it always start with position zero on the first yield return above.Di2015NewLine            position += size;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Display the header and initialize the sample.Di2015NewLine arg.ProcessUserAuthorization(authCode, state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13506862Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WriteObject(string fileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                "Creating a Person object and serializing it.");Di2015NewLine            Person p1 = new Person("Zighetti", "Barbara", 101);Di2015NewLine            FileStream writer = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine            DataContractSerializer ser =Di2015NewLine                new DataContractSerializer(typeof(Person));Di2015NewLine            ser.WriteObject(writer, p1);Di2015NewLine            writer.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void ReadObject(string fileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Deserializing an instance of the object.");Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream(fileName,Di2015NewLine            FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine            XmlDictionaryReader reader =Di2015NewLine                XmlDictionaryReader.CreateTextReader(fs, new XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas());Di2015NewLine            DataContractSerializer ser = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(Person));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Deserialize the data and read it from the instance.Di2015NewLine            Person deserializedPerson =Di2015NewLine                (Person)ser.ReadObject(reader, true);Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0} {1}, ID: {2}",Di2015NewLine            deserializedPerson.FirstName, deserializedPerson.LastName,Di2015NewLine            deserializedPerson.ID));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13506979Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetValue<T>(T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Need to use typeof to get a Type object for bool, just as with TDi2015NewLine  if (typeof(T) == typeof(bool)) {Di2015NewLine    // Need to say "get out of my way C#"Di2015NewLine    // The first cast to object is required as true (bool) isDi2015NewLine    // otherwise not castable to an unrestricted T.Di2015NewLine    // This widen-restrict approach could result in a cast error,Di2015NewLine    // but from the above check it is known that T is bool.Di2015NewLine    return (T)(object)true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  // .. other stuff that .. does stuff.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13509460Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> getAllSubstrings(this string word)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return from charIndex1 in Enumerable.Range(0, word.Length)Di2015NewLine           from charIndex2 in Enumerable.Range(0, word.Length - charIndex1 + 1)Di2015NewLine           where charIndex2 > 0Di2015NewLine           select word.Substring(charIndex1, charIndex2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13509460Di2015UniqueSeparatorLength
13509460Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerable.All
13509460Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring shortest = list.OrderBy(s => s.Length).First();Di2015NewLineIEnumerable<string> shortestSubstrings = shortestDi2015NewLine    .getAllSubstrings()Di2015NewLine    .OrderByDescending(s => s.Length);Di2015NewLinevar other = list.Where(s => s != shortest).ToArray();Di2015NewLinestring longestCommonIntersection = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineforeach (string subStr in shortestSubstrings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool allContains = other.All(s => s.Contains(subStr));Di2015NewLine    if (allContains)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        longestCommonIntersection = subStr;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13511110Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction strcmp(a, b) {Di2015NewLine    a = a.toString(), b = b.toString();Di2015NewLine    for (var i=0,n=Math.max(a.length, b.length); i<n && a.charAt(i) === b.charAt(i); ++i);Di2015NewLine    if (i === n) return 0;Di2015NewLine    return a.charAt(i) > b.charAt(i) ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13512133Di2015UniqueSeparator        private unsafe Bitmap ToBitmap(double[,] rawImage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int width = rawImage.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine            int height = rawImage.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Bitmap Image = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bitmapData = Image.LockBits(Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height),Di2015NewLine                ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine                PixelFormat.Format32bppArgbDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine            ColorARGB* startingPosition = (ColorARGB*) bitmapData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < height; i++)Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < width; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    double color = rawImage[i, j];Di2015NewLine                    byte rgb = (byte)(color * 255);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ColorARGB* position = startingPosition + j + i * width;Di2015NewLine                    position->A = 255;Di2015NewLine                    position->R = rgb;Di2015NewLine                    position->G = rgb;Di2015NewLine                    position->B = rgb;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Image.UnlockBits(bitmapData);Di2015NewLine            return Image;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public struct ColorARGBDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public byte B;Di2015NewLine            public byte G;Di2015NewLine            public byte R;Di2015NewLine            public byte A;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public ColorARGB(Color color)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                A = color.A;Di2015NewLine                R = color.R;Di2015NewLine                G = color.G;Di2015NewLine                B = color.B;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public ColorARGB(byte a, byte r, byte g, byte b)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                A = a;Di2015NewLine                R = r;Di2015NewLine                G = g;Di2015NewLine                B = b;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public Color ToColor()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(A, R, G, B);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13513037Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Node> GetTopologicalGraphOrdering(IEnumerable<Node> roots)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list=new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    var visited=new HashSet<Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<Node> visit = null;Di2015NewLine    visit = (n)=>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       if(visited.Add(n)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           foreach(Node child in n.Children)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               visit(child);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           list.Add(n)Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(Node n in roots)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       visit(n);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return list.Reverse();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13513079Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class OverlapCalculatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<Tuple<Type, Type>, Delegate> Calculations = new Dictionary<Tuple<Type, Type>, Delegate>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsOverlapping<TShape, TOtherShape>(this TShape shape, TOtherShape otherShape)Di2015NewLine        where TShape : ShapeDi2015NewLine        where TOtherShape : ShapeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var calculation = GetCalculationDelegate<TShape, TOtherShape>();Di2015NewLine        if (calculation != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return calculation(shape, otherShape);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Could not find calculation for {0} and {1}", typeof(TShape).Name, typeof(TOtherShape).Name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void AddCalculation<TShape, TOtherShape>(Func<TShape, TOtherShape, bool> calculation)Di2015NewLine        where TShape : ShapeDi2015NewLine        where TOtherShape : ShapeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = new Tuple<Type, Type>(typeof(TShape), typeof(TOtherShape));Di2015NewLine        Calculations[key] = calculation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var reverseKey = new Tuple<Type, Type>(typeof(TOtherShape), typeof(TShape));Di2015NewLine        var reverseCalculation = new Func<TOtherShape, TShape, bool>((otherShape, shape) => calculation(shape, otherShape));Di2015NewLine        Calculations[reverseKey] = reverseCalculation;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Func<TShape, TOtherShape, bool> GetCalculationDelegate<TShape, TOtherShape>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = new Tuple<Type, Type>(typeof(TShape), typeof(TOtherShape));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Delegate calculationDelegate;Di2015NewLine        if (Calculations.TryGetValue(key, out calculationDelegate))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Func<TShape, TOtherShape, bool>) calculationDelegate;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13513079Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary
13513079Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsOverlapping
13513079Di2015UniqueSeparatorShape
13513079Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add the calculation algorithm defined below.Di2015NewLine        OverlapCalculator.AddCalculation<Rectangle, Triangle>(IsOverlapping);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rect = new Rectangle();Di2015NewLine        var triangle = new Triangle();Di2015NewLine        var circle = new Circle();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // These will work since we have a two way calculation for Rectangle and TriangleDi2015NewLine        rect.IsOverlapping(triangle);Di2015NewLine        triangle.IsOverlapping(rect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This will throw since we have no calculation between Circle and Triangle.Di2015NewLine        circle.IsOverlapping(triangle);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsOverlapping(Rectangle rectangle, Triangle triangle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do specialised geometryDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13513468Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisitorExpression
13513468Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Source {Di2015NewLine    public List<Value> Values {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Value {Di2015NewLine    public int FinalValue {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Source, IEnumerable<Value>>> f1 =Di2015NewLine            source => source.Values;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<IEnumerable<Value>, bool>> f2 =Di2015NewLine            vals => vals.Any(v => v.FinalValue == 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // change the p0 from f2 => f1Di2015NewLine        var body = SwapVisitor.Swap(f2.Body, f2.Parameters[0], f1.Body);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<Source, bool>>(body,f1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        // which is:Di2015NewLine        // source => source.Values.Any(v => (v.FinalValue == 3))Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitor {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    private SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to) {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression Swap(Expression body,Di2015NewLine        Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new SwapVisitor(from, to).Visit(body);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13513468Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Expression<Func<T, bool>> ExpressionIsNamed(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<EntityName> AccessorNames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, IEnumerable<EntityName>>> accessList =Di2015NewLine        (T x) => x.Security.Readers;Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<IEnumerable<EntityName>, bool>> accessCheck =Di2015NewLine        SecurityDescriptor.AccessCheckExpression(AccessorNames);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = SwapVisitor.Swap(accessCheck.Body,Di2015NewLine        accessCheck.Parameters[0], accessList.Body);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, accessList.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13513933Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> AlignSequences<T>(this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var iters = sequencesDi2015NewLine        .Select((s, index) => new { active=true, index, enumerator = s.GetEnumerator() })Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var isActive = iters.Select(it => it.enumerator.MoveNext()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var numactive = isActive.Count(flag => flag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (numactive > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T min = itersDi2015NewLine                .Where(it => isActive[it.index])Di2015NewLine                .Min(it => it.enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var row = new T[iters.Count()];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < isActive.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!isActive[j] || !Equals(iters[j].enumerator.Current, min)) Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                row[j] = min;Di2015NewLine                if (!iters[j].enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    isActive[j] = false;Di2015NewLine                    numactive -= 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return row;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var iter in iters) iter.enumerator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13514781Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute commands with an open SQL connection.Di2015NewLine    /// Note: To execute a stored procedure send to useTransaction parameter false valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="connection">An opened SqlConnection</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="commands">A string array of the requested commands to execute</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="useTransaction">true if to force transaction, false to execute the commands without transaction</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>true for success, otherwise false</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool ExecuteSqlCommands(SqlConnection connection, string[] commands, bool useTransaction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool bStatus = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] lines = commands; // regex.Split(sql);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SqlTransaction transaction = null;Di2015NewLine        if (useTransaction)Di2015NewLine            transaction = connection.BeginTransaction();Di2015NewLine        using (SqlCommand cmd = connection.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cmd.Connection = connection;Di2015NewLine            if (useTransaction)Di2015NewLine                cmd.Transaction = transaction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string line in lines)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (line.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cmd.CommandText = line;Di2015NewLine                    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (SqlException e)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string msg = e.Message;Di2015NewLine                        if (useTransaction)Di2015NewLine                            transaction.Rollback();Di2015NewLine                        throw;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            bStatus = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (bStatus && useTransaction)Di2015NewLine            transaction.Commit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bStatus;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13515285Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void CheckIfModified(EntityObject entity, ObjectContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (entity.EntityState == EntityState.Modified)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ObjectStateEntry state = context.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntry(entity);Di2015NewLine            DbDataRecord orig = state.OriginalValues;Di2015NewLine            CurrentValueRecord curr = state.CurrentValues;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool changed = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < orig.FieldCount && !changed; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object origValue = orig.GetValue(i);Di2015NewLine                object curValue = curr.GetValue(i);Di2015NewLine                if (!origValue.Equals(curValue) && (!(origValue is byte[]) || !((byte[])origValue).SequenceEqual((byte[])curValue)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    changed = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!changed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                state.ChangeState(EntityState.Unchanged);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13518974Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddRepositionTransitionsUsingRenderTransform(this FrameworkElement control, bool x = true, bool y = true, CancellationToken lifetime = default(CancellationToken)) {Di2015NewLine    if (control == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("control");Di2015NewLine    var approachPeriod = TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // animate when positions change, to give a 'swooping' effect instead of teleportingDi2015NewLine    var transform = new TranslateTransform();Di2015NewLine    var oldPosition = May<Point>.NoValue;Di2015NewLine    EventHandler updated = (sender, arg) => {Di2015NewLine        // determine where the control has moved toDi2015NewLine        var newPosition = control.ActualWidth == 0 || control.ActualHeight == 0 || control.Visibility != Visibility.VisibleDi2015NewLine                        ? May<Point>.NoValueDi2015NewLine                        : control.TranslatePoint(new Point(-transform.X, -transform.Y), Application.Current.MainWindow);Di2015NewLine        if (oldPosition == newPosition) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // adjust the animation to initially cancel the change in position, and finish at the new final position after the approach periodDi2015NewLine        var dif = (from o in oldPositionDi2015NewLine                    from n in newPositionDi2015NewLine                    select new Point(n.X - o.X, n.Y - o.Y)Di2015NewLine                    ).ElseDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (x) transform.BeginAnimation(TranslateTransform.XProperty, new DoubleAnimation(transform.X - dif.X, 0, approachPeriod));Di2015NewLine        if (y) transform.BeginAnimation(TranslateTransform.YProperty, new DoubleAnimation(transform.Y - dif.Y, 0, approachPeriod));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oldPosition = newPosition;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // register for events and replace transform, until lifetime endsDi2015NewLine    var oldTransform = control.RenderTransform;Di2015NewLine    control.RenderTransform = transform;Di2015NewLine    control.LayoutUpdated += updated;Di2015NewLine    lifetime.Register(() => {Di2015NewLine        control.LayoutUpdated -= updated;Di2015NewLine        control.RenderTransform = oldTransform;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13519398Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void UpdateListBoxItem(ListBox lb, object item) {Di2015NewLine        int index = lb.Items.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLine        int currIndex = lb.SelectedIndex;Di2015NewLine        lb.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            lb.ClearSelected();Di2015NewLine            lb.Items[index] = item;Di2015NewLine            lb.SelectedIndex = currIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finally {Di2015NewLine            lb.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13523560Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EntityMapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T Map<T>(params object[] sources) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!sources.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var initialSource = sources[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mappingResult = Map<T>(initialSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now map the remaining source objectsDi2015NewLine        if (sources.Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Map(mappingResult, sources.Skip(1).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mappingResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Map(object destination, params object[] sources)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!sources.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var destinationType = destination.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var source in sources)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Mapper.Map(source, destination, sourceType, destinationType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T Map<T>(object source) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var destinationType = typeof(T)Di2015NewLine        var sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mappingResult = Mapper.Map(source, sourceType, destinationType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mappingResult as T;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

13527920Di2015UniqueSeparator// Example of service for applying filterDi2015NewLinepublic GetProductsResponse GetProducts(GetProductsRequest request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // base expression is true, ie always returns everythingDi2015NewLine    Expression<Func<ProductEntity, bool>> filterExpression = i => true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // subsequent filters narrow base expression resultsDi2015NewLine    if (!request.IncludeDeleted)Di2015NewLine        filterExpression = filterExpression.And(i => iDi2015NewLine            .IsDeleted == false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I like to use nullable types so that I can check whether a parameter is specified or notDi2015NewLine    if (request.CouponName != null)Di2015NewLine        filterExpression = filterExpression.And(i => Di2015NewLine            i.CouponName == request.CouponName.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (request.Company!= null)Di2015NewLine        filterExpression = filterExpression.And(i => Di2015NewLine            i.Company== request.Company.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var products = _dataContext.Products.Where(filterExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // you probably want to transform products into some sort of model specific classDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new GetProductsRequestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        products = products;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Extension methods for Linq And and Or helpersDi2015NewLinepublic static class UtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<T> Compose<T>(this Expression<T> first, Expression<T> second, Func<Expression, Expression, Expression> merge)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // build parameter map (from parameters of second to parameters of first)Di2015NewLine        var map = first.Parameters.Select((f, i) => new { f, s = second.Parameters[i] }).ToDictionary(p => p.s, p => p.f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // replace parameters in the second lambda expression with parameters from the firstDi2015NewLine        var secondBody = ParameterRebinder.ReplaceParameters(map, second.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // apply composition of lambda expression bodies to parameters from the first expression Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<T>(merge(first.Body, secondBody), first.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> first, Expression<Func<T, bool>> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return first.Compose(second, Expression.And);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> first, Expression<Func<T, bool>> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return first.Compose(second, Expression.Or);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13534439Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RetrieveNotams()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string myURL = "https://www.example.com/SecureSite";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open the certificate store for the current user in readonly mode,Di2015NewLine    // and find the certificate I need to userDi2015NewLine    X509Store xstore = new X509Store(StoreLocation.CurrentUser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    xstore.Open(OpenFlags.ReadOnly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    X509Certificate cert=null; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (X509Certificate c in xstore.Certificates)Di2015NewLine        if(c.Subject.StartsWith("CN=aidapuser"))Di2015NewLine            cert=c;          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest req;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    req = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(myURL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the certificate to the requestDi2015NewLine    req.ClientCertificates.Add(cert);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    req.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    string postData = "uid=UUUUUUU&password=PPPPPP&active=Y&type=I";Di2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine    req.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the parameters to POST to the URLDi2015NewLine    using (Stream dataStream = req.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // grab the response and show the first 10 linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(req.GetResponse().GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(sr.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13534642Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetNumberOfRows(string filename, string sheetName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string connectionString;Di2015NewLine    string count = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (filename.EndsWith(".xlsx"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connectionString = "Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0;Data Source=" + filename + ";Mode=ReadWrite;Extended Properties=\\"Excel 12.0;HDR=NO\\"";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (filename.EndsWith(".xls"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connectionString = "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source=" + filename + ";Mode=ReadWrite;Extended Properties=\\"Excel 8.0;HDR=NO;\\"";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string SQL = "SELECT COUNT (*) FROM [" + sheetName + "$]";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (OleDbConnection conn = new OleDbConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (OleDbCommand cmd = new OleDbCommand(SQL, conn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (OleDbDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reader.Read();Di2015NewLine                count = reader[0].ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        conn.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13542639Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Check that properties are equal for two instancesDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="first"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="other"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="skipPropeties">A list of names for properties not to check for equality</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static bool PropertiesEquals<T>(this T first, T other, string[] skipPropeties=null) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var type = typeof (T);Di2015NewLine    if(skipPropeties==null)Di2015NewLine        skipPropeties=new string[0];Di2015NewLine    if(skipPropeties.Except(type.GetProperties().Select(x=>x.Name)).Any())Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Type does not contain property to skip");Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfos = type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                                 .Except(type.GetProperties().Where(x=> skipPropeties.Contains( x.Name)));Di2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo propertyInfo in propertyInfos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Equals(propertyInfo.GetValue(first, null), Di2015NewLine                    propertyInfo.GetValue(other, null)))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13543188Di2015UniqueSeparator class ProgramDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     static void Main()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         // Create a FileSystemWatcher to watch the FTP incoming directory for creation of listing fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         using (var watcher = new FileSystemWatcher(@"C:\\FTP-Data\\Incoming", "*.lst"))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             // Use the FromEvent operator to setup a subscription to the Created event.           Di2015NewLine             //                                                                                    Di2015NewLine             // The first lambda expression performs the conversion of Action<FileSystemEventArgs> Di2015NewLine             // to FileSystemEventHandler. The FileSystemEventHandler just calls the handler       Di2015NewLine             // passing the FileSystemEventArgs.                                                   Di2015NewLine             //                                                                                    Di2015NewLine             // The other lambda expressions add and remove the FileSystemEventHandler to and from Di2015NewLine             // the event.                                                                         Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             var fileCreationObservable = Observable.FromEvent<FileSystemEventHandler, FileSystemEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine                                         UseOnlyTheSecondArgument,Di2015NewLine                                         fsHandler => watcher.Created += fsHandler,Di2015NewLine                                         fsHandler => watcher.Created -= fsHandler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             fileCreationObservable.Subscribe(ActionWhenFileIsUploaded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             Console.WriteLine("Press ENTER to quit the program...\\n");Di2015NewLine             Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private static void ActionWhenFileIsUploaded(FileSystemEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("{0} was created.", args.FullPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // TODODi2015NewLine         // 1. Deduce original file name from the listing file infoDi2015NewLine         // 2. Consume the data fileDi2015NewLine         // 3. Remove listing fileDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private static FileSystemEventHandler UseOnlyTheSecondArgument(Action<FileSystemEventArgs> handler)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         return (object sender, FileSystemEventArgs e) => handler(e);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

13547212Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap.RotateFlip
13547212Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Drawing
13547212Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Bitmap RotateImage(Bitmap source, float angle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (angle == 0) return (Bitmap)source.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bitmap target;Di2015NewLine        using (GraphicsPath path = new GraphicsPath())Di2015NewLine        using (Matrix matrix = new Matrix())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            path.AddRectangle(new RectangleF(0.0f, 0.0f, source.Width, source.Height));Di2015NewLine            matrix.Rotate(angle);Di2015NewLine            RectangleF rect = path.GetBounds(matrix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            target = new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(rect.Width), (int)Math.Round(rect.Height));Di2015NewLine            target.SetResolution(source.HorizontalResolution, source.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(target))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.TranslateTransform(-rect.X, -rect.Y);Di2015NewLine                g.RotateTransform(angle);Di2015NewLine                g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine                g.DrawImageUnscaled(source, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13547329Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction combinations(array1, count1, array2, count2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = [];Di2015NewLine    combine(array1, 0, count1, array2, 0, count2, [], result);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction combine(array1, offset1, count1, array2, offset2, count2, chosen, result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var i;Di2015NewLine    var temp;Di2015NewLine    if (count1) {Di2015NewLine        count1--;Di2015NewLine        for (i = offset1; i < array1.length - count1; i++) {Di2015NewLine            temp = chosen.concat([array1[i]]); // this copies the array and appends the itemDi2015NewLine            combine(array1, i + 1, count1, array2, offset2, count2, temp, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } else if (count2) {Di2015NewLine        count2--;Di2015NewLine        for (i = offset2; i < array2.length - count2; i++) {Di2015NewLine            temp = chosen.concat([array2[i]]);Di2015NewLine            combine(null, 0, 0, array2, i, count2, temp, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        result.push(chosen); // don't need to copy here, just accumulate resultsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13548184Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> SplitByCharacterType(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(input)) throw new ArgumentNullException("input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder segment = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    segment.Append(input[0]);Di2015NewLine    System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory cat = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(input[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tc = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(input[i]);Di2015NewLine        if (tc == cat)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            segment.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return segment.ToString();Di2015NewLine            segment.Clear();Di2015NewLine            segment.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine            cat = tc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return segment.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13548184Di2015UniqueSeparatorsplitByCharacterTypeCamelCase
13548184Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> SplitByCharacterTypeCamelCase(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(input)) throw new ArgumentNullException("input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder segment = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    segment.Append(input[0]);Di2015NewLine    System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory cat = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(input[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tc = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(input[i]);Di2015NewLine        if (tc == cat)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            segment.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (cat == System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory.UppercaseLetter &&Di2015NewLine                  tc == System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory.LowercaseLetter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            segment.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine            cat = tc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return segment.ToString();Di2015NewLine            segment.Clear();Di2015NewLine            segment.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine            cat = tc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return segment.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13551590Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void draw_groundLand1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int a = 0; a < 10; a++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Copy any parent transforms.Di2015NewLine            Matrix[] transforms = new Matrix[model_ground_land1.Bones.Count];Di2015NewLine            model_ground_land1.CopyAbsoluteBoneTransformsTo(transforms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the model. A model can have multiple meshes, so loop.Di2015NewLine            foreach (ModelMesh mesh in model_ground_land1.Meshes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // This is where the mesh orientation is set, as well Di2015NewLine                // as our camera and projection.Di2015NewLine                foreach (BasicEffect effect in mesh.Effects)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    effect.EnableDefaultLighting();Di2015NewLine                    effect.World = transforms[mesh.ParentBone.Index] *Di2015NewLine                Matrix.CreateRotationY(cubeGroundLand1_modelRotation) * Matrix.CreateTranslation(cubeGroundLand1_position);Di2015NewLine                    effect.View = View;Di2015NewLine                    //effect.Texture = text_ground_lan1;Di2015NewLine                    effect.Projection = Projection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    cubeGroundLand1_position.X = (float)a+1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Draw the mesh, using the effects set above.Di2015NewLine                mesh.Draw();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13551787Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PremultiplyTexture(Texture2D texture)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Color[] buffer = new Color[texture.Width * texture.Height];Di2015NewLine    texture.GetData(buffer);Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < buffer.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[i] = Color.FromNonPremultiplied(Di2015NewLine                buffer[i].R, buffer[i].G, buffer[i].B, buffer[i].A);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    texture.SetData(buffer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13552263Di2015UniqueSeparator1 << theArray.Length
13552263Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void GetArrays(int[] arr, int combination, out int[] arr1, out int[] arr2) {Di2015NewLine  List<int> a = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine  List<int> b = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine  foreach (int value in arr) {Di2015NewLine    if ((combination & 1) == 1) {Di2015NewLine      b.add(value);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      a.add(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    combination >>= 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  arr1 = a.ToArray();Di2015NewLine  arr2 = b.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
