13555877Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BlackThread { Di2015NewLine    //* ===== *//Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent pauser = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent waiter = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Thread innerThr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ----- //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsActing {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if (innerThr != null) return innerThr.IsAlive;Di2015NewLine            else return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //* ===== *//Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void KickStart_(ThreadStart start) {Di2015NewLine        innerThr = new Thread(start);Di2015NewLine        innerThr.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WaitForIt();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ----- //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // FOR THE THREADED FUNCTIONDi2015NewLine    public void Wait() {Di2015NewLine        waiter.Set();Di2015NewLine        pauser.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void End() {Di2015NewLine        waiter.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ----- //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // FOR BLACKTHREAD MANAGINGDi2015NewLine    private void WaitForIt() {Di2015NewLine        waiter.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Continue() {Di2015NewLine        if (IsActing) {Di2015NewLine            pauser.Set();Di2015NewLine            WaitForIt();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //* ===== *//Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13555877Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MainClass {Di2015NewLine    static void pausableFunction() {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* Waiting...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Event.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* Doing stuff.");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Event.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* Finished!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Event.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void anotherFunction(int foo) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* Wanna know the value of a number?");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Event.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* I'll tell you. It's {0}!", foo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Event.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void simpleFunction() {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("* I'm done already!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static BlackThread Event = new BlackThread();   Di2015NewLine    static Random Rand = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main() {        Di2015NewLine        int r;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        do {Di2015NewLine            if (!Event.IsActing) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                r = Rand.Next(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (r == 0) {Di2015NewLine                    Event.KickStart_(() => pausableFunction());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (r == 1) {Di2015NewLine                    simpleFunction();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    Event.KickStart_(() => anotherFunction(Rand.Next(20) + 1));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                Event.Continue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("> ");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        } while(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineCREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[updateStatuses] Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @Ids VARCHAR(Max),Di2015NewLine    @StatusIds VARCHAR(Max)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine     DECLARE @tblIds TABLE (key1 INT IDENTITY(1,1), myId INT)Di2015NewLine     DECLARE @tblStatusIds TABLE (key2 INT IDENTITY(1,1), myStatusId INT)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     INSERT INTO @tblIdsDi2015NewLine        SELECT ITEMS FROM dbo.Split(@Ids,',')Di2015NewLine     INSERT INTO @tblStatusIdsDi2015NewLine        SELECT ITEMS FROM dbo.Split(@StatusIds,',')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     --//Do your status update hereDi2015NewLine     UPDATE yt.statusId = s.myStatusIdDi2015NewLine     FROM [YourTable] yt JOIN @tblIds i Di2015NewLine                ON yt.id = i.myId JOIN @tblStatusIds sDi2015NewLine                ON i.key1 = s.key2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

13564805Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ModelStateDictionaryHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void AddModelError<TViewModel>(Di2015NewLine        this ModelStateDictionary me,Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TViewModel, object>> lambdaExpression, string error)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        me.AddModelError(GetPropertyName(lambdaExpression), error);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetPropertyName(Expression lambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IList<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        var e = lambdaExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (e.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Lambda:Di2015NewLine                    e = ((LambdaExpression)e).Body;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                    var propertyInfo = ((MemberExpression)e).Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                    var prop = propertyInfo != nullDi2015NewLine                                      ? propertyInfo.NameDi2015NewLine                                      : null;Di2015NewLine                    list.Add(prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var memberExpression = (MemberExpression)e;Di2015NewLine                    if (memberExpression.Expression.NodeType != ExpressionType.Parameter)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var parameter = GetParameterExpression(memberExpression.Expression);Di2015NewLine                        if (parameter != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            e = Expression.Lambda(memberExpression.Expression, parameter);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return string.Join(".", list.Reverse());Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ParameterExpression GetParameterExpression(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            expression = ((MemberExpression)expression).Expression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.Parameter ? (ParameterExpression)expression : null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13566586Di2015UniqueSeparator[Flags]Di2015NewLineenum eParseState: byteDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bold = 1,Di2015NewLine    italic = 2,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Sample input: "<txt>This is <i>some</i> text. <b>This value is <i>bold</i>.</b> This one is not.</txt>"Di2015NewLinestatic void parseRichText( TextBlock tb, string xml )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tb.Inlines.Clear();Di2015NewLine    XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create( new StringReader( xml ), new XmlReaderSettings() { ConformanceLevel=ConformanceLevel.Fragment } );Di2015NewLine    eParseState state = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var names = new Dictionary<string, eParseState>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { "b", eParseState.bold },Di2015NewLine        { "i", eParseState.italic },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<bool> actElement = ( bool isOpening ) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string name = reader.Name.ToLower();Di2015NewLine        eParseState flag;Di2015NewLine        if( !names.TryGetValue( name, out flag ) ) return;Di2015NewLine        if( isOpening )Di2015NewLine            state |= flag;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            state &= ( ~flag );Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while( reader.Read() )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch( reader.NodeType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.Element:Di2015NewLine                actElement( true );Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.EndElement:Di2015NewLine                actElement( false );Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.Text:Di2015NewLine                var run = new Run() { Text = reader.Value };Di2015NewLine                if( 0 != ( state & eParseState.bold ) ) run.FontWeight = FontWeights.Bold;Di2015NewLine                if( 0 != ( state & eParseState.italic ) ) run.FontStyle = FontStyles.Italic;Di2015NewLine                tb.Inlines.Add( run );Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13566679Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ReadOrderData(string connectionString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string queryString =Di2015NewLine        "SELECT OrderID, CustomerID FROM dbo.Orders;";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection connection =Di2015NewLine               new SqlConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand command =Di2015NewLine            new SqlCommand(queryString, connection);Di2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SqlDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call Read before accessing data.Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0}, {1}", reader[0], reader[1]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call Close when done reading.Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13569451Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Remove characters from stringDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static string RemoveSpecialCharacters(string text, bool allowSpace)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var normalizedString = text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Prepare the symbol table.Di2015NewLine    var symbolTable = new Dictionary<char, char[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('a', new char[] { '', '', '', '', '' });Di2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('c', new char[] { '' });Di2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('e', new char[] { '', '', '', '' });Di2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('i', new char[] { '', '', '', '' });Di2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('o', new char[] { '', '', '', '', '' });Di2015NewLine    symbolTable.Add('u', new char[] { '', '', '', '' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Replaces the symbols.Di2015NewLine    foreach (var key in symbolTable.Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var symbol in symbolTable[key])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            normalizedString = normalizedString.Replace(symbol, key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the other special characters.Di2015NewLine    if (allowSpace)Di2015NewLine        normalizedString = System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(normalizedString, @"[^0-9a-zA-Z.-_\\s]+?", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        normalizedString = System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(normalizedString, @"[^0-9a-zA-Z.-_]+?", string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return normalizedString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13569863Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FindLCMDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static int determineLCM(int a, int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num1, num2;Di2015NewLine        if (a > b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num1 = a; num2 = b;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num1 = b; num2 = a;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= num2; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((num1 * i) % num2 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return i * num1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return num2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(String[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n1, n2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Enter 2 numbers to find LCM");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        n1 = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine        n2 = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int result = determineLCM(n1, n2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LCM of {0} and {1} is {2}",n1,n2,result);Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13570850Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateExpression<T>(Expression<Func<T, int>> parameter, FilterOperator @operator, int value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var argExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLine    var paramExpr = Expression.Invoke(parameter, argExpr);Di2015NewLine    var constExpr = Expression.Constant(value);Di2015NewLine    Expression compExpr = null;Di2015NewLine    switch(@operator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case FilterOperator.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine            compExpr = Expression.GreaterThan(paramExpr, constExpr);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case FilterOperator.LessThan:Di2015NewLine            compExpr = Expression.LessThan(paramExpr, constExpr);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(compExpr, argExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13570850Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateExpression<T>(Expression<Func<T, int>> parameter, FilterOperator @operator, int value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var memberExpr = (MemberExpression)parameter.Body;Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo property = (PropertyInfo)memberExpr.Member;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var argExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLine    var propertyExpr = Expression.Property(argExpr, property);Di2015NewLine    var constExpr = Expression.Constant(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression compExpr = null;Di2015NewLine    switch(@operator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case FilterOperator.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine            compExpr = Expression.GreaterThan(propertyExpr, constExpr);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case FilterOperator.LessThan:Di2015NewLine            compExpr = Expression.LessThan(propertyExpr, constExpr);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(compExpr, argExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13580255Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void PrintDevices(USMC_DEVICES_st um)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int serialSize = 16;Di2015NewLine            const int verSize = 4;Di2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (var i= 0; i < um.NOD; i++, j+= IntPtr.Size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ser = Marshal.ReadIntPtr(um.serial, j);Di2015NewLine                var ver = Marshal.ReadIntPtr(um.Version, j);Di2015NewLine                // ensure we check for null pointers - just in caseDi2015NewLine                if (ver == IntPtr.Zero || ser == IntPtr.Zero) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Device {0}, \\tSerial number {1}",Di2015NewLine                                    Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(ser, serialSize),Di2015NewLine                                    Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(ver, verSize));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13585848Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<decimal> SplitValue2(decimal value, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (count <= 0) throw new ArgumentException("count must be greater than zero.", "count");Di2015NewLine    var result = new decimal[count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    decimal runningTotal = 0M;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var remainder = value - runningTotal;Di2015NewLine        var share = remainder > 0M ? Math.Max(Math.Round(remainder / ((decimal)(count - i)), 2), .01M) : 0M;Di2015NewLine        result[i] = share;Di2015NewLine        runningTotal += share;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (runningTotal < value) result[count - 1] += value - runningTotal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13586633Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<List<T>> Transpose<T>(List<List<T>> lists)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var longest = lists.Any() ? lists.Max(l => l.Count) : 0;Di2015NewLine    List<List<T>> outer = new List<List<T>>(longest);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < longest; i++)Di2015NewLine        outer.Add(new List<T>(lists.Count));Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < lists.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < longest; i++)Di2015NewLine            outer[i].Add(lists[j].Count > i ? lists[j][i] : default(T));Di2015NewLine    return outer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13588577Di2015UniqueSeparator//From http://blogs.officezealot.com/whitechapel/archive/2005/04/10/4514.aspxDi2015NewLinepublic class ExcelInteropServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string EXCEL_CLASS_NAME = "EXCEL7";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const uint DW_OBJECTID = 0xFFFFFFF0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Guid rrid = new Guid("{00020400-0000-0000-C000-000000000046}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate bool EnumChildCallback(int hwnd, ref int lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("Oleacc.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int AccessibleObjectFromWindow(int hwnd, uint dwObjectID, byte[] riid, ref Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Window ptr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern bool EnumChildWindows(int hWndParent, EnumChildCallback lpEnumFunc, ref int lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int GetClassName(int hWnd, StringBuilder lpClassName, int nMaxCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application GetExcelInterop(int? processId = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p = processId.HasValue ? Process.GetProcessById(processId.Value) : Process.Start("excel.exe");Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new ExcelInteropService().SearchExcelInterop(p);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(p != null, "p != null");Di2015NewLine            return GetExcelInterop(p.Id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool EnumChildFunc(int hwndChild, ref int lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buf = new StringBuilder(128);Di2015NewLine        GetClassName(hwndChild, buf, 128);Di2015NewLine        if (buf.ToString() == EXCEL_CLASS_NAME) { lParam = hwndChild; return false; }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application SearchExcelInterop(Process p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Window ptr = null;Di2015NewLine        int hwnd = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int hWndParent = (int)p.MainWindowHandle;Di2015NewLine        if (hWndParent == 0) throw new ExcelMainWindowNotFoundException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EnumChildWindows(hWndParent, EnumChildFunc, ref hwnd);Di2015NewLine        if (hwnd == 0) throw new ExcelChildWindowNotFoundException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int hr = AccessibleObjectFromWindow(hwnd, DW_OBJECTID, rrid.ToByteArray(), ref ptr);Di2015NewLine        if (hr < 0) throw new AccessibleObjectNotFoundException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ptr.Application;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13588650Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void cvtbProduct_Email_OnServerValidate(object sender, ServerValidateEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var emailList = (TextBox) RadGrid1.MasterTableView.GetInsertItem().FindControl("Product_Email");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(emailList.Text))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            args.IsValid = false;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //you don't need to check if it has the seperator in itDi2015NewLine        var emails = emailList.Text.Split(';');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var email in emails)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //the @ before a string removes the need to double up on '\\'Di2015NewLine            //you were missing a '\\' before the .Di2015NewLine            var valid = Regex.IsMatch(email, @"\\w+([-+.']\\w+)*@ABCCompany\\.com");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!valid)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                args.IsValid = false;Di2015NewLine                return; //don't check anymoreDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //all must have passedDi2015NewLine        args.IsValid = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13589266Di2015UniqueSeparatorCartesianProduct
13589266Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine   IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine   return sequences.Aggregate(emptyProduct, (accumulator, sequence) => accumulator.SelectMany(accseq => sequence.Select(item => accseq.Concat(new[] { item }))));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> BuildCombinations<T>() where T : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var query = from prop in typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine               let attributes = prop.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(CombinationsAttribute), false)Di2015NewLine               where attributes != null && attributes.Length != 0Di2015NewLine               let attribute = (CombinationsAttribute)attributes[0]Di2015NewLine               select attribute.PossibleValues.Select(value => new { prop, value })Di2015NewLine   ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var combinations = CartesianProduct(query);Di2015NewLine   foreach (var combination in combinations)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var item = new T();Di2015NewLine      foreach (var pair in combination)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         pair.prop.SetValue(item, pair.value, null);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      yield return item;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13593080Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Request.Params["dir"] != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.IO.DirectoryInfo di = new System.IO.DirectoryInfo(Path.Combine("c:\\\\", Request.Params["dir"]));Di2015NewLine            if (di.Exists)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DirectoryInfo[] directories = di.GetDirectories("*.*", SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly);Di2015NewLine                Response.Write("<ul class=\\"jqueryFileTree\\" >\\n");Di2015NewLine                //Itera sobre os subdiretrios de cada driverDi2015NewLine                foreach (System.IO.DirectoryInfo di_child in directories)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Response.Write("\\t<li class=\\"directory collapsed\\"><a href=\\"#\\" rel=\\"" + di_child.Name + "/\\">" + di_child.Name + "</a>\\n");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                foreach (System.IO.FileInfo fi in di.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string ext = "";Di2015NewLine                    if (fi.Extension.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ext = fi.Extension.Substring(1).ToLower();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Response.Write("\\t<li class=\\"file ext_" + ext + "\\"><a href=\\"#\\" rel=\\"" + fi.Name + "\\">" + fi.Name + "</a></li>\\n");Di2015NewLine                }// Arquivos Di2015NewLine                Response.Write("</ul></li>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13593134Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AsyncWorker_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!e.Cancelled && e.Error == null && !IsDisposed && !IsDisposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_closing)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Grid = e.Result as MyGrid;Di2015NewLine                    AttachEventHandlersToGrid();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    (e.Result as MyGrid).Dispose(); //call Dispose again, now you know that worker has finishedDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected bool HasBackgroundWorkerFinished()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_worker == null ||Di2015NewLine                !_worker.IsBusy)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            _worker.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine            _closing = true; //this means that worker is busyDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool dispose = true;Di2015NewLine            if (disposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dispose = HasBackgroundWorkerFinished();Di2015NewLine                if (dispose)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Dispose other stuffDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(dispose) //don't dispose if worker didn't finishDi2015NewLine                base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13593269Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> FlattenTree<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //you could change this to a Queue or any other data structure Di2015NewLine    //to change the type of traversal from depth first to breath first or whateverDi2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>(); Di2015NewLine    while (stack.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T next = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        yield return next;Di2015NewLine        foreach (T child in selector(next))Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13594576Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static void Clouds(Canvas canvas, int boundry)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var image in canvas.Children.OfType<Image>())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (image.Name.Contains("cloud_"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Canvas.GetLeft(image) < canvas.ActualWidth + image.Width)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Canvas.SetLeft(image, Canvas.GetLeft(image) + 1);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Canvas.SetTop(image, random.Next(0 - ((int)image.Height / 2), Core.GetPercentage((int)canvas.ActualHeight, boundry)));Di2015NewLine                        Canvas.SetLeft(image, 0 - image.Width);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13596143Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a double animation.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="from">From position</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="to">To position</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="duration">The duration.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="delay">The delay.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="autoreverse">if set to <c>true</c> [autoreverse].</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="repeat">The times to repeat.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>new double animation</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames GetDoubleAnimation(double from, double to, int duration, int delay, bool autoreverse, int repeat)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var doubleanimation = new DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames();Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.AutoReverse = autoreverse;Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.IsAdditive = false;Di2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetDesiredFrameRate(doubleanimation, 30);Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.IsCumulative = false;Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.BeginTime = new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0, 0, delay);Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(duration));Di2015NewLine            doubleanimation.RepeatBehavior = repeat == -1 ? 13602918Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReadOnlyDictionaryWrapper<TKey, TValue, TReadOnlyValue> : IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TReadOnlyValue> where TValue : TReadOnlyValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<TKey, TValue> _dictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyDictionaryWrapper(IDictionary<TKey, TValue> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dictionary == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("dictionary");Di2015NewLine        _dictionary = dictionary;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool ContainsKey(TKey key) { return _dictionary.ContainsKey(key); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TKey> Keys { get { return _dictionary.Keys; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryGetValue(TKey key, out TReadOnlyValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TValue v;Di2015NewLine        var result = _dictionary.TryGetValue(key, out v);Di2015NewLine        value = v;Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TReadOnlyValue> Values { get { return _dictionary.Values.Cast<TReadOnlyValue>(); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TReadOnlyValue this[TKey key] { get { return _dictionary[key]; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Count { get { return _dictionary.Count; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<TKey, TReadOnlyValue>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _dictionaryDi2015NewLine                    .Select(x => new KeyValuePair<TKey, TReadOnlyValue>(x.Key, x.Value))Di2015NewLine                    .GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13602994Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe byte[] GetBytes(TestStruct item)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Figure out how big TestStruct isDi2015NewLine    var size = Marshal.SizeOf(item);Di2015NewLine    //Make an array large enough to hold all the bytes requiredDi2015NewLine    var array = new byte[size];Di2015NewLine    //Get a pointer to the structDi2015NewLine    var itemPtr = &item;Di2015NewLine    //Change the type of the pointer from TestStruct* to byte*Di2015NewLine    var itemBytes = (byte*) itemPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Iterate from the first byte in the data to the last, copying the values into ourDi2015NewLine    //    temporary storageDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array[i] = itemBytes[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Return the bytes that were found in the instance of TestStructDi2015NewLine    return array;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13602994Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe TestStruct Reconstitute(IList<byte> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Figure out how big TestStruct isDi2015NewLine    var size = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(TestStruct));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If the data we've been presented with is either too large or too small to containDi2015NewLine    //    the data for exactly one TestStruct instance, throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine    if (data.Count != size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Amount of data available is not the exact amount of data required to reconstitute the item");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Make our temporary instanceDi2015NewLine    var item = new TestStruct();Di2015NewLine    //Get a pointer to our temporary instanceDi2015NewLine    var itemPtr = &item;Di2015NewLine    //Change the type of the pointer to byte*Di2015NewLine    var itemBytes = (byte*) itemPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Iterate from the first byte in the data to the last, copying the values into ourDi2015NewLine    //    temporary instanceDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        itemBytes[i] = data[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Return our reconstituted structureDi2015NewLine    return item;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13602994Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var test = new TestStructDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        A = 1,Di2015NewLine        B = 3Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bytes = GetBytes(test);Di2015NewLine    var duplicate = Reconstitute(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Original");Di2015NewLine    PrintObject(test, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Reconstituted");Di2015NewLine    PrintObject(duplicate, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13602994Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrintObject
13602994Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void PrintObject(object instance, int initialIndentLevel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PrintObject(instance, initialIndentLevel, 4, ' ', new List<object>());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void PrintObject(object instance, int level, int indentCount, char paddingChar, ICollection<object> printedObjects)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (printedObjects.Contains(instance))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tabs = "".PadLeft(level * indentCount, paddingChar);Di2015NewLine    var instanceType = instance.GetType();Di2015NewLine    printedObjects.Add(instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var member in instanceType.GetMembers())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object value;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                    var property = (PropertyInfo) member;Di2015NewLine                    value = property.GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                    var field = (FieldInfo) member;Di2015NewLine                    value = field.GetValue(instance);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value == null || value.GetType().IsValueType || value.GetType().ToString() != value.ToString())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{2}{0}: {1}", member.Name, (value ?? "(null)"), tabs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var vals = value as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (vals != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var index = 0;Di2015NewLine                var indented = "".PadLeft((level + 1) * indentCount, paddingChar);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{2}{0}: {1}", member.Name, value, tabs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var val in vals)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{1}[{0}]:", index++, indented);Di2015NewLine                    PrintObject(val, level + 2, indentCount, paddingChar, printedObjects);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0}(No elements)", indented);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PrintObject(value, level + 1, indentCount, paddingChar, printedObjects);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13604715Di2015UniqueSeparator   function FindProxyForURL(url, host) {Di2015NewLine      // our local URLs from the domains below example.com don't need a proxy:Di2015NewLine      if (shExpMatch(url,"*.example.com/*")) {return "DIRECT";}Di2015NewLine      if (shExpMatch(url, "*.example.com:*/*")) {return "DIRECT";}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // URLs within this network are accessed through Di2015NewLine      // port 8080 on fastproxy.example.com:Di2015NewLine      if (isInNet(host, "10.0.0.0",  "255.255.248.0"))    {Di2015NewLine         return "PROXY fastproxy.example.com:8080";Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // All other requests go through port 8080 of proxy.example.com.Di2015NewLine      // should that fail to respond, go directly to the WWW:Di2015NewLine      return "PROXY proxy.example.com:8080; DIRECT";Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

13604863Di2015UniqueSeparator        // Setup Datatable to hold the informationDi2015NewLine        DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.AddRange(new DataColumn[] {Di2015NewLine            new DataColumn("Number", typeof(int)), Di2015NewLine            new DataColumn("IP Address", typeof(string)),Di2015NewLine            new DataColumn("Ping", typeof(int)),Di2015NewLine            new DataColumn("GUID", typeof(string)),Di2015NewLine            new DataColumn("Name", typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get info            Di2015NewLine        string info = sendRConCommand("players");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Split RowsDi2015NewLine        string[] infoRows = info.Split(new string[] { Environment.NewLine }, StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLine        int start = 3; // ignore first 3 linesDi2015NewLine        while (start < infoRows.Length - 1) // Ignore last lineDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Split row on spaces, and remove anything that is an empty spaceDi2015NewLine            string[] row = infoRows[start].Split(new string[] { " " }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine            DataRow dr = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            dr["Number"] = int.Parse(row[0].ToString());Di2015NewLine            dr["IP Address"] = row[1].ToString();Di2015NewLine            dr["Ping"] = int.Parse(row[2].ToString());Di2015NewLine            dr["GUID"] = row[3].ToString();Di2015NewLine            int nameItem = 4;Di2015NewLine            while (nameItem < row.Length)Di2015NewLine            {   // Names can have spaces, so we need to mergeDi2015NewLine                dr["Name"] += " " + row[nameItem].ToString();Di2015NewLine                nameItem++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dr["Name"] = dr["Name"].ToString().Trim(); // Trim any leading spacesDi2015NewLine            dt.Rows.Add(dr);Di2015NewLine            start++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Job DoneDi2015NewLine        mygridview.DataSource = dt;Di2015NewLine

13606799Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.CompilerServices;Di2015NewLinepublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Bar() { return "I was here"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object obj = new Foo();Di2015NewLine        object result = DynamicCallWrapper.Invoke(obj, "Bar");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class DynamicCallWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Hashtable has nice threading semanticsDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Hashtable cache = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine    public static object Invoke(object target, string methodName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object found = cache[methodName];Di2015NewLine        if (found == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (cache)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found = cache[methodName];Di2015NewLine                if(found == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cache[methodName] = found = CreateCallSite(methodName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var callsite = (CallSite<Func<CallSite, object,object>>)found;Di2015NewLine        return callsite.Target(callsite, target);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static object CreateCallSite(string methodName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CallSite<Func<CallSite, object, object>>.Create(Di2015NewLine            Binder.InvokeMember(Di2015NewLine            CSharpBinderFlags.None, methodName, null, typeof(object),Di2015NewLine            new CSharpArgumentInfo[] {Di2015NewLine                CSharpArgumentInfo.Create(Di2015NewLine                     CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.None, null) }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class OtherFact : FactDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override TypeOfFact FactTypeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return TypeOfFact.Other; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Ilist<Fact> facts = new List<Fact>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new GdpFact { Year = 2010 },Di2015NewLine                new OtherFact { Year = 2010 },Di2015NewLine                new GdpFact { Year = 2009 },Di2015NewLine                new OtherFact { Year = 2009 },Di2015NewLine                new GdpFact { Year = 2011 },Di2015NewLine                new OtherFact { Year = 2011 },Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int interations = 1000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var funcs = new List<Func<IList<Fact>, Fact>>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ByList,Di2015NewLine                ByType,Di2015NewLine                ByEnumDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // WarmupDi2015NewLine        foreach (var func in funcs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           Measure(5, func, facts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ResultsDi2015NewLine        foreach (var result in funcs.Select(f => newDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Description = f.Method.Name,Di2015NewLine                Ms = Measure(iterations, f, facts)Di2015NewLine            }))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                "{0} time = {1}ms",Di2015NewLine                result.Description,Di2015NewLine                result.Ms);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long Measure(Di2015NewLine        int iterations,Di2015NewLine        Func<IList<Fact>, Fact> func,Di2015NewLine        IList<Fact> facts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var stopwatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            func.Invoke(facts);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Fact ByType(IList<Fact> facts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return facts.FirstOrDefault(f =>Di2015NewLine            f.Year == 2011 && f is GdpFact);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Fact ByEnum(IList<Fact> facts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return facts.FirstOrDefault(f =>Di2015NewLine            f.Year == 2011 && f.FactType == TypeOfFact.Gdp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Fact ByCast(IList<Fact> facts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return facts.OfType<GdpFact>()Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(f => f.Year == 2011);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13611480Di2015UniqueSeparator        private static bool DictionaryEquals<TKey, TValue>(Dictionary<TKey, TValue> left, Dictionary<TKey, TValue> right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var comp = EqualityComparer<TValue>.Default;Di2015NewLine            if (left.Count != right.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (typeof(TValue).IsGenericType && typeof(TValue).GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(List<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return left.All(pair => right.ContainsKey(pair.Key) && ListEquals((dynamic)pair.Value, (dynamic)right[pair.Key]));            Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return left.All(pair => right.ContainsKey(pair.Key) && comp.Equals(pair.Value, right[pair.Key]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool ListEquals<TValue>(List<TValue> left, List<TValue> right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (left.Count != right.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return left.All(right.Contains);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13611631Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat verticalOffset = 1.65f;  Di2015NewLinefloat longitudinalOffset = 0f;  Di2015NewLinefloat lateralOffset = .2f;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGunWorldMatrix = Matrix.Invert(view); // GunWorldMatrix is now a world space version of the camera's Matrix with position & orientation of the camera  Di2015NewLineVector3 camPosition = GunWorldMatrix.Translation;// note position of camera so when setting gun position, we have a starting point.  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGunWorldMatrix *= Matrix.CreateFromAxisAngle(GunWorldMatrix.Up, 0.15f); // gives the gun that slight angle to point towards target while laterally offset a bit  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineVector3 gunPositionOffsets = (GunWorldMatrix.Up * verticalOffset) +  Di2015NewLine                                (GunWorldMatrix.Forward * longitudinalOffset) +  Di2015NewLine                                (GunWorldMatrix.Right * lateralOffset);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGunWorldMatrix.Translation = camPosition + gunPositionOffsets; Di2015NewLine

13613586Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace WPF.MVVMBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Property Decorator that marks the Property as Observable. This is used by the EditableObject class to determine for which properties to raise the Property Changed methodDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class ObservablePropertyAttribute : System.Attribute{};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Extends the ObservableObject class. EditableObject implements methods which are used to edit the object as well as raise the Property Changed events.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The Struct for the Editable Object</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    public abstract class EditableObject<T> : ObservableObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Private VariablesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool _IsEditEnabled = false;Di2015NewLine        bool _IsSelected = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected T _editData;Di2015NewLine        protected T _backupData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Public PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Controls if the Edit is enabled on the Editable ObjectDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public bool IsEditEnabledDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _IsEditEnabled;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _IsEditEnabled = value;Di2015NewLine                this.RaisePropertyChanged("IsEditEnabled");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Determines weather the object is Selected. Used with ListsDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public bool IsSelectedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _IsSelected;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _IsSelected = value;Di2015NewLine                this.RaisePropertyChanged("IsSelected");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ConstructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public EditableObject()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Create an instance of the object that will hold the data.Di2015NewLine            _editData = Activator.CreateInstance<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Abstract MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handle the object saving. This is called by the SaveChanges method.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Indicates if the object was saved successfully</returns>Di2015NewLine        protected abstract bool SaveObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handle the object remove. This is called by the Remove method.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Indicates if the object was removed successfully</returns>Di2015NewLine        protected abstract bool RemoveObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Begin editing the object. Sets the IsEditEnabled to true and creates a backup of the Data for restoring.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void BeginEdit()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IsEditEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine            _backupData = Mapper.DynamicMap<T>(_editData);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Discard any changes made to the object. Set the IsEditEnabled flag to false and restore the data from the Backup.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void DiscardChanges()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _editData = _backupData;Di2015NewLine            IsEditEnabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RaisePropertiesChanged(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Save the changes made to the object. Calls the SaveObject method. If save was successfull IsEditEnabled is set to false and backup data is set to current data.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Indicates if the object was saved successfully</returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool isSaveSuccessfull = SaveObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (isSaveSuccessfull == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _backupData = _editData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IsEditEnabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                RaisePropertiesChanged(this);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return isSaveSuccessfull;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Remove()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool isRemoveSuccessfull = RemoveObject();Di2015NewLine            return isRemoveSuccessfull;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Raises ObservableObject Property Changed for all the decorated methods in the given object so that the interface can refresh accordingly.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="baseObject"></param>Di2015NewLine        public void RaisePropertiesChanged(object baseObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] properties = baseObject.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo property in properties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object[] attributes = property.GetCustomAttributes(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool isObservableProperty = (from attribute in attributesDi2015NewLine                                             where attribute is ObservablePropertyAttributeDi2015NewLine                                             select attribute).Count() > 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (isObservableProperty)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    RaisePropertyChanged(property.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13613588Di2015UniqueSeparatorLoadSources(uri)

13613588Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void LoadSources(object uri)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine    client.DownloadStringAsync(new Uri(uri.ToString(), UriKind.Absolute));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    client.DownloadStringCompleted += (s, a) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (thisLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (a.Error == null && !a.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Text.Add(a.Result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.CountDown.Signal();Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13614411Di2015UniqueSeparatorTexture2D.GetData
13614411Di2015UniqueSeparatorColor[,] tiles = new Color[LEVEL_WIDTH,LEVEL_HEIGHT];Di2015NewLine
13614411Di2015UniqueSeparator//Load the texture from the content pipelineDi2015NewLineTexture2D texture = Content.Load<Texture2D>("Your Texture Name and Directory");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Convert the 1D array, to a 2D array for accessing data easily (Much easier to do Colors[x,y] than Colors[i],because it specifies an easy to read pixel)Di2015NewLineColor[,] Colors = TextureTo2DArray(texture);Di2015NewLine
13614411Di2015UniqueSeparator    Color[,] TextureTo2DArray(Texture2D texture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Color[] colors1D = new Color[texture.Width * texture.Height]; //The hard to read,1D arrayDi2015NewLine        texture.GetData(colors1D); //Get the colors and add them to the arrayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color[,] colors2D = new Color[texture.Width, texture.Height]; //The new, easy to read 2D arrayDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < texture.Width; x++) //Convert!Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < texture.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                colors2D[x, y] = colors1D[x + y * texture.Width];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return colors2D; //Done!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13615003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main() {Di2015NewLine    bool a = bool.Parse("false");Di2015NewLine    bool b = bool.Parse("true");Di2015NewLine    bool c = bool.Parse("true");Di2015NewLine    var sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    const int Max = 1000000000;Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    // The loop will increment count Max times; let's measure how long it takesDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != Max; i++) {Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    var baseTime = sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != Max; i++) {Di2015NewLine        if (a.Equals(c)) count++;Di2015NewLine        if (b.Equals(c)) count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds - baseTime);Di2015NewLine    sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine    count = 0;Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != Max; i++) {Di2015NewLine        if (a==c) count++;Di2015NewLine        if (b==c) count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds - baseTime);Di2015NewLine    sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine    count = 0;Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != Max; i++) {Di2015NewLine        if (!a) count++;Di2015NewLine        if (!b) count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds - baseTime);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13615162Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<string, string> LoadActivityLookup(string filePath) {Di2015NewLine    const int KEY_LENGTH = 10;Di2015NewLine    var newLookup = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string line in File.ReadAllLines(filePath)) {Di2015NewLine        if (line.Length < KEY_LENGTH) continue;Di2015NewLine        string key = line.Substring(0, KEY_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine        if (!newLookup.ContainsKey(key)) {Di2015NewLine            string value = line.Substring(KEY_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine            newLookup.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return newLookup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13615162Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<string, string> LoadActivityLookup(string filePath) {Di2015NewLine    const int KEY_LENGTH = 10;Di2015NewLine    var newLookup = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    using (StreamReader rdr = new StreamReader(filePath)) {Di2015NewLine        string line = rdr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        while (line != null) {Di2015NewLine            if (line.Length < KEY_LENGTH) {Di2015NewLine                line = rdr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            string key = line.Substring(0, KEY_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine            if (!newLookup.ContainsKey(key)) {Di2015NewLine                string value = line.Substring(KEY_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine                newLookup.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            line = rdr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return newLookup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

But for now I'm using the ApplicationStartupHandler event subscription methodDi2015NewLine    // in MemberEvent.csDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Inherit the default membership provider and substitute my own method that's fired when a member triesDi2015NewLine    /// to log in. UIPropertyMetadata(false));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnItemsSourceChanged(System.Collections.IEnumerable oldValue, System.Collections.IEnumerable newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We capture the ItemsSourceChanged to check if the new one is modifiable, so we can react to its changes.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var oldSource = oldValue as INotifyCollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine        if(oldSource != null)Di2015NewLine            oldSource.CollectionChanged -= ItemsSource_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newSource = newValue as INotifyCollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (newSource != null)Di2015NewLine index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.PrepareContainerForItemOverride(element, item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ReindexItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine itemContainer = this.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(item);Di2015NewLine            if (itemContainer == null) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = this.Items.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLine            SetIsLast(itemContainer, index == this.Items.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine            SetIndex(itemContainer, index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13621571Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal string GetSystemDefaultBrowser()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string name = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey regKey = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //set the registry key we want to openDi2015NewLine        regKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("HTTP\\\\shell\\\\open\\\\command", false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get rid of the enclosing quotesDi2015NewLine        name = regKey.GetValue(null).ToString().ToLower().Replace("" + (char)34, "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //check to see if the value ends with .exe (this way we can remove any command line arguments)Di2015NewLine        if (!name.EndsWith("exe"))Di2015NewLine            //get rid of all command line arguments (anything after the .exe must go)Di2015NewLine            name = name.Substring(0, name.LastIndexOf(".exe") + 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        name = string.Format("ERROR: An exception of type: {0} occurred in method: {1} in the following module: {2}", ex.GetType(), ex.TargetSite, this.GetType());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //check and see if the key is still open, if soDi2015NewLine        //then close itDi2015NewLine        if (regKey != null)Di2015NewLine            regKey.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //return the valueDi2015NewLine    return name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13628257Di2015UniqueSeparatorint start,end;  // track start and endDi2015NewLineend = start = arr[0];Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 1; i < arr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // as long as entries are consecutive, move end forwardDi2015NewLine    if (arr[i] == (arr[i - 1] + 1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        end = arr[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // when no longer consecutive, add group to resultDi2015NewLine        // depending on whether start=end (single item) or notDi2015NewLine        if (start == end)Di2015NewLine            result += start + ",";Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            result += start + "-" + end + ",";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        start = end = arr[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// handle the final groupDi2015NewLineif (start == end)Di2015NewLine    result += start;Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine    result += start + "-" + end;Di2015NewLine

13631626Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class IPExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static int ToInteger(this IPAddress IP)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      int result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      byte[] bytes = IP.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine      result = (int)(bytes[0] << 24 | bytes[1] << 16 | bytes[2] << 8 | bytes[3]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return result;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //returns 0 if equalDi2015NewLine   //returns 1 if ip1 > ip2Di2015NewLine   //returns -1 if ip1 < ip2Di2015NewLine   public static int Compare(this IPAddress IP1, IPAddress IP2)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       int ip1 = IP1.ToInteger();Di2015NewLine       int ip2 = IP2.ToInteger();Di2015NewLine       return (((ip1 - ip2) >> 0x1F) | (int)((uint)(-(ip1 - ip2)) >> 0x1F));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress ip1 = IPAddress.Parse("127.0.0.1");Di2015NewLine        IPAddress ip2 = IPAddress.Parse("10.254.254.254");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ip1.Compare(ip2) == 0)Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("ip1 == ip2");Di2015NewLine        else if (ip1.Compare(ip2) == 1)Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("ip1 > ip2");Di2015NewLine        else if (ip1.Compare(ip2) == -1)Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("ip1 < ip2");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13632459Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyList<T> : IList<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<T, List<int>> _indexMap;Di2015NewLine    List<T> _items;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int IndexOf(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> indices;Di2015NewLine        if(_indexMap.TryGetValue(item, out indices))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return indices[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> indices;Di2015NewLine        if(!_indexMap.TryGetValue(item, out indices))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indices = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            _indexMap[item] = indices;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        indices.Add(_items.Count);Di2015NewLine        _items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Attempt at a Remove implementation, this could probably be improvedDi2015NewLine    // but here is my first crack at itDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> indices;Di2015NewLine        if(!_indexMap.TryGetValue(item, out indices))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Not found so can just return falseDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int index = indices[0];Di2015NewLine        indices.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine        if (indices.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _indexMap.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i=index+1; i < _items.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> otherIndexList = _indexMap[_items[i]];Di2015NewLine            for(int j=0; j < otherIndexList.Count; ++j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int temp = otherIndexList[j];Di2015NewLine                if (temp > index)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    otherIndexList[j] = --temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _items.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... Other similar type functions hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

MyMethod()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //you can do work like crazy here, but any time you want to update UI from this method,Di2015NewLine            //it should be done with a delegate method like:Di2015NewLine            SetStatusLabel("this happened");Di2015NewLine            //andDi2015NewLine            SetStatusLabel("I just did something else");Di2015NewLine 13639083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyInterceptor : IInterceptorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Task Result { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Intercept(IInvocation invocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            invocation.Proceed();Di2015NewLine            Result = (Task)invocation.ReturnValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine            tcs.SetException(ex);Di2015NewLine            Result = tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13640129Di2015UniqueSeparatori
13640129Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace rpncalc {Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : Form {Di2015NewLine        public Form1 () {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void RPNCalc (TextBox TxtBoxInputbox, TextBox TxtBoxOutputbox) {Di2015NewLine            Stack<int> stackone = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLine            stackone.Clear();Di2015NewLine            string[] inputarray = TxtBoxInputbox.Text.Split();Di2015NewLine            int end = inputarray.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            int numinput;Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            do {Di2015NewLine                if (inputarray[i] != "=" && inputarray[i] != "+" && inputarray[i] != "-" && inputarray[i] != "*" && inputarray[i] != "/") {Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        numinput = Convert.ToInt32(inputarray[i]);Di2015NewLine                        stackone.Push(numinput);Di2015NewLine                    } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                        MessageBox.Show(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } else if (inputarray[i] == "+") {Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        int store1 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        int store2 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        stackone.Push(store2 + store1);Di2015NewLine                    } catch {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } else if (inputarray[i] == "-") {Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        int store1 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        int store2 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        stackone.Push(store2 - store1);Di2015NewLine                    } catch {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } else if (inputarray[i] == "*") {Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        int store1 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        int store2 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        stackone.Push(store2 * store1);Di2015NewLine                    } catch {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } else if (inputarray[i] == "/") {Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        int store1 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        int store2 = stackone.Pop();Di2015NewLine                        stackone.Push(store2 / store1);Di2015NewLine                    } catch {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (i++ < end && inputarray[i] != "=" && stackone.Count != 0);Di2015NewLine            string txtout = TxtInputBox.Text + " " + stackone.Pop().ToString() + Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine            TxtOutputBox.AppendText(txtout);Di2015NewLine            TxtInputBox.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Btn_Calc_Click (object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine            RPNCalc(TxtInputBox, TxtOutputBox);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

messagebox on left button down:Di2015NewLine    private int MyWndProc(IntPtr hWnd, int Msg, int wParam, int lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (Msg)Di2015NewLine doSomething();Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return CallWindowProc(oldWndProc, hWnd, Msg, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13641327Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Socket s = new Socket(SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.TCP);Di2015NewLine    Socket cl = null;Di2015NewLine    System.Net.IPEndPoint endpoint = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(0, 400); // listen on all adapters on port 400Di2015NewLine    s.Bind(endpoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    s.Listen(BACKLOG);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] rcvBuffer = new byte[BUFFSIZE];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (; ; )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine        cl = s.Accept();Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("Handling Client >> " + cl.RemoteEndPoint + "\\n\\n\\n");Di2015NewLine        cl.Receive(rcvBuffer, BUFFSIZE, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine        text = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(rcvBuffer, 0, BUFFSIZE).TrimEnd('\\0');Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(text);Di2015NewLine        cl.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13641839Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal[] intRemover (string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Regex.Matches(input,@"[+-]?\\d+(\\.\\d+)?")//this returns all the matches in inputDi2015NewLine                .Cast<Match>()//this casts from MatchCollection to IEnumerable<Match>Di2015NewLine                .Select(x=>decimal.Parse(x.Value))//this parses each of the matched string to decimalDi2015NewLine                .ToArray();//this converts IEnumerable<decimal> to an Array of decimalDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13641839Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static decimal[] intRemover (string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n=0;Di2015NewLine        MatchCollection matches=Regex.Matches(input,@"[+-]?\\d+(\\.\\d+)?");Di2015NewLine        decimal[] decimalarray = new decimal[matches.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Match m in matches) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                decimalarray[n] = decimal.Parse (m.Value);Di2015NewLine                n++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return decimalarray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13645075Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult ajaxUpdate()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //open connectionDi2015NewLine            dbcontext db = new dbcontext();Di2015NewLine            db.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the last updated record in the database.Di2015NewLine            var entry = db.Entry.OrderByDecending(m=> m.LastUpdatedDate).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //clean upDi2015NewLine            db.Connection.Close();Di2015NewLine            db.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //return -1 as errorDi2015NewLine            if(entry == null){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Json(-1,JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get current number of people in queueDi2015NewLine            Int32 numberOfPeople = entry.QueueNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TimeSpan span = DateTime.Now.Subtract(entry.LastUpdatedDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(span.Minutes >= 20){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // if 20 mins have passed assume a person has been completed since manual updateDi2015NewLine                numberOfPeople--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //this returns a number, alternatively you can return a PartialDi2015NewLine            return Json(numberOfPeople, JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13650523Di2015UniqueSeparator=
13650523Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void RPNCalc(string rpnValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<int> stackCreated = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tokens = rpnValue.Replace("(", " ").Replace(")", " ")Di2015NewLine                                 .Split().Where(s => !String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(s));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var t in tokens) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    stackCreated.Push(Convert.ToInt32(t));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                } catch {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int store1 = stackCreated.Pop();Di2015NewLine                    int store2 = stackCreated.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    switch(t) {Di2015NewLine                        case "+": store2 += store1; break;Di2015NewLine                        case "-": store2 -= store1; break;Di2015NewLine                        case "*": store2 *= store1; break;Di2015NewLine                        case "/": store2 /= store1; break;Di2015NewLine                        case "%": store2 %= store1; break;Di2015NewLine                        case "^": store2 = (int) Math.Pow(store2, store1); break; /* was (int) Math.Pow(store1, store2); in the original code*/  Di2015NewLine                        default: throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    stackCreated.Push(store2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(stackCreated.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Please check the input");Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                textBox1.Text =   stackCreated.Pop().ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Please check the input");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
