13651917Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic object s_lock = new object();Di2015NewLinestatic IDictionary<Type, Func<BinaryReader, dynamic>> s_readers = null;Di2015NewLinestatic T ReadData<T>(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (s_lock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s_readers == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s_readers = new Dictionary<Type, Func<BinaryReader, dynamic>>();Di2015NewLine            s_readers.Add(typeof(int), r => r.ReadInt32());Di2015NewLine            s_readers.Add(typeof(string), r => r.ReadString());Di2015NewLine            // Add more hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!s_readers.ContainsKey(typeof(T))) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var fs = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read))Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = new BinaryReader(fs))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s_readers[typeof(T)](reader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13660425Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock
13660425Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AsyncLockDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly AsyncSemaphore m_semaphore;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Task<Releaser> m_releaser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AsyncLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_semaphore = new AsyncSemaphore(1);Di2015NewLine        m_releaser = Task.FromResult(new Releaser(this));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Task<Releaser> LockAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var wait = m_semaphore.WaitAsync();Di2015NewLine        return wait.IsCompleted ?Di2015NewLine            m_releaser :Di2015NewLine            wait.ContinueWith((_, state) => new Releaser((AsyncLock)state),Di2015NewLine                this, CancellationToken.None,Di2015NewLine                TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously, TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public struct Releaser : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly AsyncLock m_toRelease;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Releaser(AsyncLock toRelease) { m_toRelease = toRelease; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_toRelease != null)Di2015NewLine                m_toRelease.m_semaphore.Release();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AsyncSemaphoreDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly static Task s_completed = Task.FromResult(true);Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<TaskCompletionSource<bool>> m_waiters = new Queue<TaskCompletionSource<bool>>();Di2015NewLine    private int m_currentCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AsyncSemaphore(int initialCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (initialCount < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("initialCount");Di2015NewLine        m_currentCount = initialCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Task WaitAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_waiters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_currentCount > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                --m_currentCount;Di2015NewLine                return s_completed;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var waiter = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine                m_waiters.Enqueue(waiter);Di2015NewLine                return waiter.Task;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Release()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<bool> toRelease = null;Di2015NewLine        lock (m_waiters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_waiters.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                toRelease = m_waiters.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                ++m_currentCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (toRelease != null)Di2015NewLine            toRelease.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13663220Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Thread _udpReadThread;Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool _terminateThread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event DataEventHandler OnDataReceived;Di2015NewLine    public delegate void DataEventHandler(object sender, DataEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CreateUdpReadThread()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _udpReadThread = new Thread(UdpReadThread) { Name = "UDP Read thread" };Di2015NewLine        _udpReadThread.Start(new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 1234));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UdpReadThread(object endPoint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var myEndPoint = (EndPoint)endPoint;Di2015NewLine        var udpListener = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLine        udpListener.SetSocketOption(SocketOptionLevel.Socket, SocketOptionName.ReuseAddress, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Important to specify a timeout value, otherwise the socket ReceiveFrom() Di2015NewLine        // will block indefinitely if no packets are received and the thread will never terminateDi2015NewLine        udpListener.SetSocketOption(SocketOptionLevel.Socket, SocketOptionName.ReceiveTimeout, 100);Di2015NewLine        udpListener.Bind(myEndPoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!_terminateThread)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine                    var size = udpListener.ReceiveFrom(buffer, ref myEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                    Array.Resize(ref buffer, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Let any consumer(s) handle the data via an eventDi2015NewLine                    FireOnDataReceived(((IPEndPoint)(myEndPoint)).Address, buffer);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (SocketException socketException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Handle socket errorsDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Close SocketDi2015NewLine            udpListener.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine            udpListener.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DataEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public byte[] Data { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public IPAddress IpAddress { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DataEventArgs(IPAddress ipaddress, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IpAddress = ipaddress;Di2015NewLine            Data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13666446Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic long RecursivePLINQ(long factor,long total)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(total == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (factor > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Parallel.For<long>(0, 1, () => factor, (j, loop, factorial) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1);    /*Simulate Moderate Operation*/Di2015NewLine                total = factorial * RecursivePLINQ(--factorial, total);Di2015NewLine                return total;Di2015NewLine            }, (i) =>  {return;});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13666724Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock
13666724Di2015UniqueSeparator        object obj = Volatile.Read<object>(ref this.m_threadSafeObj);Di2015NewLine        bool flag = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj != Lazy<T>.ALREADY_INVOKED_SENTINEL)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(obj, ref flag);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (this.m_boxed == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                boxed = this.CreateValue();Di2015NewLine                this.m_boxed = boxed;Di2015NewLine                Volatile.Write<object>(ref this.m_threadSafeObj, Lazy<T>.ALREADY_INVOKED_SENTINEL);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                boxed = (this.m_boxed as Lazy<T>.Boxed);Di2015NewLine                if (boxed == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Lazy<T>.LazyInternalExceptionHolder lazyInternalExceptionHolder = this.m_boxed as Lazy<T>.LazyInternalExceptionHolder;Di2015NewLine                    lazyInternalExceptionHolder.m_edi.Throw();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (flag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
13666836Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Dictionary<Guid, TaskTracker> _taskMap = new Dictionary<Guid, TaskTracker>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnButton1Click(object sender, EventArgs eventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TaskTracker taskTracker = new TaskTracker(Guid.NewGuid(), OnDoWork);Di2015NewLine        _taskMap.Add(taskTracker.Identity, taskTracker);Di2015NewLine        taskTracker.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnDoWork(CancellationToken token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100); // Do some work, checking if cancel requested every once in a whileDi2015NewLine            if (token.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnButton2Click(object sender, EventArgs eventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Guid identity = _taskMap.Count > 0 ? _taskMap.First().Value.Identity : default(Guid);  // find some way to get the desired taskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TaskTracker taskTracker;Di2015NewLine        if (_taskMap.TryGetValue(identity, out taskTracker))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            taskTracker.TaskExiting += OnTaskExiting;Di2015NewLine            taskTracker.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnTaskExiting(object sender, EventArgs eventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TaskTracker taskTracker = (TaskTracker)sender;Di2015NewLine        taskTracker.TaskExiting -= OnTaskExiting;Di2015NewLine        _taskMap.Remove(taskTracker.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Time ellapsed for No partitioning at all version {0}ms , thread id was {1}", taskTracker.Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds, Task.CurrentId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnButton3Click(object sender, EventArgs eventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Guid identity = _taskMap.Count > 0 ? _taskMap.First().Value.Identity : default(Guid);  // find some way to get the desired taskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TaskTracker taskTracker;Di2015NewLine        if (_taskMap.TryGetValue(identity, out taskTracker))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            taskTracker.TaskExiting += OnTaskExiting;Di2015NewLine            taskTracker.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13666836Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TaskTrackerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Action<CancellationToken> OnDoWork;Di2015NewLine    private readonly CancellationTokenSource TokenSource;Di2015NewLine    private readonly CancellationToken Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _isRunning;Di2015NewLine    private Task _task;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TaskTracker(Guid identity, Action<CancellationToken> onDoWork)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        Token = TokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Identity = identity;Di2015NewLine        OnDoWork = onDoWork;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public readonly Guid Identity;Di2015NewLine    public readonly Stopwatch Stopwatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler TaskExiting;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void        Stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        while (_isRunning)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            OnDoWork(Token);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    finallyDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (TaskExiting != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            TaskExiting(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }, TokenDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop(bool waitForTaskToExit = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_task == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Task hasn't been started yet");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _isRunning = false;Di2015NewLine        if (waitForTaskToExit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _task.Wait();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _task = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Cancel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_task == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Task hasn't been started yet");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _isRunning = false;Di2015NewLine        TokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        _task = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13667962Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns all subsequences of the input <see cref="IEnumerable<T>"/>.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="source">The sequence of items to generate subsequences of.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A collection containing all subsequences of the input <see cref="IEnumerable<T>"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Subsequences<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    // Ensure that the source IEnumerable is evaluated only onceDi2015NewLine    return subsequences(source.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> subsequences<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var comb in subsequences(source.Skip(1)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return comb;Di2015NewLine            yield return source.Take(1).Concat(comb);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13670193Di2015UniqueSeparator        double a = Convert.ToDouble(textBox1.Text); // Tip: I would recomment using Double.TryParse() instead of what you have here unless you know a number will always be in this box (I will provide an example with your 'z')Di2015NewLine        double b = Convert.ToDouble(textBox2.Text); // Tip: I would recomment using Double.TryParse() instead of what you have here unless you know a number will always be in this box (I will provide an example with your 'z')Di2015NewLine        /* double z = Convert.ToDouble(label1.Text);  /* First off, you need to correct your syntax errors:Di2015NewLine                                                    * You had: double z - Convert.toDouble(label1.Text);   Notice the minus (-) and not equal (=) signDi2015NewLine                                                    *  You also need to capatilize the 'T' in what you have 'toDouble' and change it to 'ToDouble' Di2015NewLine                                                    *  Second off, you need to correct your runtime errors:Di2015NewLine                                                    *  In this line, you are trying to convert something in this label (lbl1) to a double.  This will not work because at Di2015NewLine                                                    *  runtime, there is nothing in this label because it has no text. Incase you don't know, if you are using Visual Studio, you should Di2015NewLine                                                    *  put a break point on this line by pressing F9.  Then when you run your application, Visual Studio will halt/pause here so you can see Di2015NewLine                                                    *  value of label1.Text by moving your mouse over it.  You will notice it is "" which cannot be converted Di2015NewLine                                                    *  There are a few possible solutions that you can emply to make this work but I will show you my prefered method below: */Di2015NewLine        double z;Di2015NewLine        bool didItParseDouble = Double.TryParse(label1.Text, out z); /* The first paramater is what you want to try and parse.. in this case, you are trying to parse a label.Di2015NewLine                                              * If it can parse it, it will assign the value to the out parameter which is 'z'  You must preceed this with the out keyword!Di2015NewLine                                               * If it can't parse, it will */Di2015NewLine        if (didItParseDouble)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // It parsed/convered (although parse and convert are technically different)Di2015NewLine            // When you first run the application, you will NOT hit this block of code because ditItParse is false because label1.Text is "".  (Put a break point here and you will see)Di2015NewLine            // This is where you should put your calcuations at.  Don't forget, though, that if the user enters nothing for the first or second textbox, your code as is will fail so you should do a try parse there as well!Di2015NewLine            // There are many ways to handle this, various patters, this is just one.
